That you do not pee in your pants,

To have friends.

To get a driver's license.

At the age of 23 years, success is.......
To graduate from a university.

At the age of 25 years, success is........
To get a job

At the age of 30 years, success is........
To be a family Man.

At the age of 35 years, success is........
To make money.

At the age of 45 years, success is.......
To maintain the appearance of a young man.

At the age of 50 years, success is.......
To provide good education for your children.

At the age of 55 years, success is...
To still be able to perform your duties well.

At the age of 60 years, success......
To still be able to keep driving license
Â 
At the age of 65 years, success is.......
To live without disease.

At the age of 70 years, success is........
To not be a burden on any one.

At the age of 75 years, success is........
To have old friends.

At the age of 80 years, success is.......
To know the way back home.

At the age of 85 years, success is.......
That not to pee in your pants again.

9/21/16, 11:38 PM - Faraz Kashif: When I walked up on him....
*Sir Abdullah Jan* was addressing  teachers before the start of new school year.
I peeked thru the glass in the door and the first glimpse he had of me, forced him to jog his memory.

He continued addressing the teachers not recognising at first.

Than it hit him hard.
HE stopped and started starring at me again.

I hesitated to introduce myself 
Kept a sweet smile on my face the whole time.

He than opened the door and said you are Kashif ??
I confirmed 

He hugged me,  kissed my neck and introduced me to the group of his teachers.

I realised that while starring at me he was not only trying to recall who I was but as if his young teaching days just flashed before his eyes 

He was remembering himself being young *thru me*

I saw an old man being jolted with memoire's of his young age 
His eyes started watering, immediately looked away and collected himself.

I knew he is still teaching there so I  took a gift for him.
The moment i handed it to him he just couldnt control it anymore.
I saw tears rolling down his face with a smile.

I realised how previous all these teachers are when he said no one  knows i am still here 
No one comes to visit me.

I hugged him and bid farewell only  to see him a few months later with more gifts for almost every one specially those with decades of  service.

I wish to do a lot more than just that.
Being away from their families and  children, our teachers did the best they could.

They will always be a part of our prayers.

9/22/16, 1:48 AM - Faraz Kashif: Donald Trump and Barack Obama somehow ended up at the same barbershop.

As they sat there, each being worked on by a different barber, not a word was spoken. The barbers were even afraid to start 
a conversation, for fear it would turn to politics.

As the barbers finished their shaves, the one who had Trump 
in his chair reached for the aftershave.

Trump was quick to stop him saying, 'No thanks, my wife will smell that and think I've been in a whorehouse,'

The second barber turned to Obama and said, 'How about you?'

Obama replied, 'Go ahead, my wife doesn't know what the inside of a whorehouse smells like.'

9/22/16, 7:20 AM - Salah Khan: NCC first day and Last day.

I went for NCC in 1991. Me Mubashar Adil & Sheheryar  were on the same flight.
Any ways had to report H-9 on a certain date which I didn't and thought will go the next day. Arrived from Pabbi my village at H9 college and when entered was shocked to see all the Jawans ready in uniforms. Marta kia na karta joined them as they were announcing the squads. After a while a colonel came and was checking everyone out, came and stood next to me and gave me two hits on my arms with his stick and said "pehle hi din say shurow ho gay" I was wearing jeans and a red striped shirt. I was embarrassed and thought Khalid Saeed has followed me here too with his stick. Anyways days passed. Loads of tullaz. On 12th Aug me Adil Sherry and I guess shajee went to mury. They went back on 13th I guess and I stayed for another couple of days. Came back from mury and went to collect my NCC Certificate on the last day. Woke up, ironed my uniform, polished my boots and wore that dark green thirchi topi. Reached the college and found no one in the ground. Went to a hall and once again was stunned to see only me in uniform and the rest cadets easy in their casuals. Again met the colonel. Got my certificate with a bonus of 2 sticks and a smile. ğŸ˜€
Directed by Fred Quimby

9/23/16, 1:51 AM - Faraz Kashif: Naveed,
I cant forget Muazzam, normally he acted okay but occasionally he acted spontaneously.

He got upset at something and we were walking out and from nowhere he kicked me hard on my leg  ğŸ˜
I felt pain for days and didnt tell anyone 
Than i said to myself he has issues and can lash out at any time without a gesture or notice

So i need to keep my distance ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
We made up later
9/23/16, 2:02 AM - Faraz Kashif: Yes i met Qutab back in 1994 in Orlando

I drove from Texas all the way to Orlando
Adeel had left for Pakistan so it was only him and his roommates 

Qutab set me up for an argument with his room mates intentionally over a religious topic ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

I said to myself *if i dont let them lead in this argument, I would find myself sleeping tonight inside the car, which could be challenging*

Qutab was giggling all the while in the background.

We settled our differences and I let them have the upper hand and than after dinner over tea I called Qutab *CHIRANDI*
he asked what is that

I told him thats you 
Chirandain karna aap ki Fitraat may hay, yeh aap bhi change nahi kar saktay

He confessed he is a bit naughty
I said naughty is a nice word 
Chirandi is the right word

He laughed his ass off ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
When he realised what it meant.
We stayed up all night sharing memories.

9/27/16, 4:21 AM - Ahsan Naveed Sheikh: This is one of the best suspense jokes till date
ğŸ˜œ

A Father put his 3year old daughter to bed, told her a story and listened to her prayers which ended by saying, 
"God bless Mommy, God bless Daddy, God bless Grandma and good-bye Grandpa."

The father asked, 'Why did you say good-bye Grandpa?'

The little girl said, "I don't know daddy, it just seemed like the thing to do."

The next day grandpa died. 
The father thought it was a strange coincidence.

A few months later the father put the girl to bed and listened to her prayers which went like this, "God bless Mommy, God Bless Daddy and good-bye Grandma."

The next day the grandmother died.

"Holy crap" thought the father, "this kid is in contact with the other side."

Several weeks later when the girl was going to bed the dad heard her say, "God bless Mommy and good-bye Daddy."

He practically went into shock. He couldn't sleep all night and got up at the crack of dawn to go to his office. 

He was nervous as a cat all day, had lunch and watched the clock.. He figured if he could get by until midnight he would be okay. 

He felt safe in the office, so instead of going home at the end of the day he stayed there, drinking coffee, looking at his watch and jumping at every sound. Finally midnight arrived; he breathed a sigh of relief and went home.

When he got home his wife said, "I've never seen you work so late. What's the matter?"

He said, "I don't want to talk about it, I've just spent the worst day of my life."

She said, "You think you had a bad day, you'll never believe what happened to me. This morning my boss died in the middle of a meeting!"
ğŸ˜œğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Enjoy fun suspense thrillerğŸ˜„

9/28/16, 6:21 AM - Farrukh Eijaz: HOW TO INSTALL HUSBAND :

A woman writes to the IT Technical support Guy :-

Dear Tech Support,
Last year I upgraded from Boyfriend 5.0 to Husband 1.0 and I noticed a distinct slowdown in the overall system performance. This is particularly in the flower and jewellery applications, which operated flawlessly under Boyfriend 5.0! 

In addition, Husband 1.0 uninstalled another
valuable program, Romance 9.5, and then installed undesirable programs such as NEWS 5.0, MONEY 3.0 and CRICKET 4.1

What can I do? 
Rgds 
Xxxx 

Reply :

Dear Madam,
First, keep in mind, Boyfriend 5.0 is an Entertainment  Package, while Husband 1.0 is an operating system.

Please enter command- ithoughtyoulovedme.html and try to download Tears 6.2 , then only it will automatically run the applications Jewellery 2.0 and Flowers 3.5

However, remember, overuse of the above application can cause Husband 1.0 to default to Silence 2.5 , Beer 6.1 or Whisky 6.8

Also DO NOT disturb the original package of Husband 1.0 Otherwise new virus Girlfriend 2.5 will automatically be downloaded into your system. 
So please be careful! 

In addition, please do not attempt to reinstall the Boyfriend 5.0 program. 
These are unsupported applications and will crash Husband 1.0

We recommend: Cooking 3.0

Good Luck Madam !
Rgds
Xxxx

Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Ù† Ø§ÛŒÙ Ù¾ÛŒÚ© ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† ( Amrican afpak doctrine) Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ø§Ú© Ø§ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ù…Ø§ Ø§ÛŒÚˆÙ…Ù†Ø³Ù¹Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ Ø­Ú©Ù…Øª Ø¹Ù…Ù„ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ ØªØ­Øª Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù† Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¨ØªØ¯Ø±ÛŒØ¬ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø§Ù†Ø¯Ø± Ù„Û’ Ú©Ø± Ø¬Ø§Ù†Ø§ ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ú¯ÙˆØ±ÛŒÙ„Ø§ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ú©Ø±ÙˆØ§Ù†ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û” Ø¯Ø±Ø­Ù‚ÛŒÙ‚Øª ÛŒÛÛŒ ÙˆÛ ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ ØªØ­Øª Ø§Ø³ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ù… Ø§Ø² Ú©Ù… Ø¯Ùˆ Ù„Ø§Ú©Ú¾ ÙÙˆØ¬ Ø­Ø§Ù„Øª Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø¨ ØªÚ© ÛÙ… Ú©Ù… Ø§Ø² Ú©Ù… Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ 20 ÛØ²Ø§Ø± ÙÙˆØ¬ÛŒ Ú¯Ù†ÙˆØ§ Ú†Ú©Û’ ÛÛŒÚº Ø¬Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø§ØªÚ¾ Ù„Ú‘ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ù†ÛŒ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÛŒ ØªÛŒÙ†ÙˆÚº Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø´ÛÛŒØ¯ ÛÙˆÙ†Û’ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹ÛŒ ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø§Ø¯ Ø³Û’ Ø²ÛŒØ§Ø¯Û ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”Û” Ø§Ø³ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ø§ Ø¢Ù¾Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù†Ù„ Ø§ØªØ­Ø§Ø¯ ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ø±Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÙ„ Ú©ÛŒ ØªÛŒÚ©Ù†ÛŒÚ©ÛŒ Ù…Ø¯Ø¯ Ø­Ø§ØµÙ„ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”Û”Û” Ø§Ø³Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ú©Ø±Ù… Ø§ÙˆØ± ÛÙ†Ú¯Ùˆ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø´ÛŒØ¹Û Ø³Ù†ÛŒ ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯Ø§Øª Ú©Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø¦Û’ Ú¯Ø¦Û’ Ø§ÙˆØ± ÙˆØ§Ø¯ÛŒ Ø³ÙˆØ§Øª Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†ÙØ§Ø° Ø´Ø±ÛŒØ¹Øª Ú©Û’ Ù†Ø§Ù… Ù¾Ø± Ø§ÛŒØ³Û’ Ú¯Ø±ÙˆÛ Ú©Ùˆ Ù…Ø³Ù„Ø· Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ù†ÛÙˆÚº Ù†Û’ ÙˆÛØ§Úº Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù… Ù¾Ø± Ù…Ø¸Ø§Ù„Ù… ÚˆÚ¾Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ø§ÙˆØ± ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯ Ø¨Ø±Ù¾Ø§ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ù…Ø¬Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù‹ Ù¾ÛÙ„ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ù†Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ø§Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø¯ÛŒÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„ ÛÙˆÙ†Ø§ Ù¾Ú‘Ø§ Û”Û”Û”Û”Û” Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ù†Û’ Ø¹Ù…Ù„ÛŒ Ø·ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ù†Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾ÛŒÚ†Ú¾Û’ Ø¯Ú¾Ú©ÛŒÙ„ Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ù„ÛŒÚ©Ù† Ù†Ø¸Ø±ÛŒØ§ØªÛŒ Ø·ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø§Ù†Ú©Ùˆ Ø¨ÛØª Ø³Û’ Ø­Ù„Ù‚ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ú¾Ø±Ù¾ÙˆØ± Ø³Ù¾ÙˆØ±Ù¹ Ø­Ø§ØµÙ„ ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ø³Ú©ÛŒ ÙˆØ¬Û Ø³Û’ Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù… Ø§Ù¾Ù†ÛŒ Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø§ØªÚ¾ Ø§Ø³ Ø·Ø±Ø­ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ú©Ú¾Ú‘ÛŒ Ø¬ÛŒØ³Ø§ ÛÙˆÙ†Ø§ Ú†Ø§ÛØ¦Û’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ú©ÛŒ ÙˆØ¬Û ØªÛŒØ³Ø±ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø°Ø±ÛŒØ¹Û’ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ú©Û’ Ø§ØªØ­Ø§Ø¯ÛŒ Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ù¾Ø± Ø­Ù…Ù„Û Ø¢ÙˆØ± ÛÛŒÚº Ø§Ø³Ú©Ùˆ ÙÙˆØ±ØªÚ¾ Ø¬Ù†Ø±Ø²ÛŒØ´Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø± Ú©ÛØ§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ !!

ÙÙˆØ±ØªÚ¾ Ø¬Ù†Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø± (Fourth-generation warfare) Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ù†ÛØ§ÛŒØª Ø®Ø·Ø±Ù†Ø§Ú© Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ Ø­Ú©Ù…Øª Ø¹Ù…Ù„ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ø³Ú©Û’ ØªØ­Øª Ù…Ù„Ú© Ú©ÛŒ Ø§ÙÙˆØ§Ø¬ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù… Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„Ù Ø·Ø±ÛŒÙ‚ÙˆÚº Ø³Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ±ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒØ¯Ø§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§ØªÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ù…Ø±Ú©Ø²ÛŒ Ø­Ú©ÙˆÙ…ØªÙˆÚº Ú©Ùˆ Ú©Ù…Ø²ÙˆØ± Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ ØµÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø¦ÛŒØª Ú©Ùˆ ÛÙˆØ§ Ø¯Û’ Ø¬Ø§ØªÛŒ ÛÛ’ ØŒ Ù„Ø³Ø§Ù†ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…Ø³Ù„Ú©ÛŒ ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯Ø§Øª Ú©Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø¦Û’ Ø¬Ø§ØªÛ’ ÛÛŒÚº Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¹ÙˆØ§Ù… Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„Ù Ø·Ø±ÛŒÙ‚ÙˆÚº Ø³Û’ Ù…Ø§ÛŒÙˆØ³ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø°ÛÙ†ÛŒ Ø®Ù„ÙØ´Ø§Ø± Ù¾Ú¾ÛŒÙ„Ø§ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”Û” Ø§Ø³Ú©Û’ Ø°Ø±ÛŒØ¹Û’ Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ù…Ù„Ú© Ú©Ø§ Ù…ÛŒÚˆÛŒØ§ Ø®Ø±ÛŒØ¯Ø§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ú©Û’ Ø°Ø±ÛŒØ¹Û’ Ù…Ù„Ú© Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø®Ù„ÙØ´Ø§Ø± ØŒ Ø§Ù†Ø§Ø±Ú©ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¨Û’ ÛŒÙ‚ÛŒÙ†ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒÙÛŒØª Ù¾ÛŒØ¯Ø§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§ØªÛŒ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”Û”Û”Û” ÙÙˆØ±ØªÚ¾ Ø¬Ù†Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø¯Ø¯ Ø³Û’ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û Ù†Û’ Ù¾ÛÙ„Û’ ÛŒÙˆÚ¯ÙˆØ³Ù„Ø§ÙˆÛŒÛ ØŒ Ø¹Ø±Ø§Ù‚ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù„ÛŒØ¨ÛŒØ§ Ú©Ø§ Ø­Ø´Ø± Ú©Ø± Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ø§Ø¨ Ø§Ø³ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ Ø­Ú©Ù…Øª Ø¹Ù…Ù„ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø³Ø±ÛŒØ§ Ù¾Ø± Ø¢Ø²Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§ Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¨Ø¯Ù‚Ø³Ù…ØªÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø§Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø§Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú©Ø§ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø§Ù…ÛŒØ§Ø¨ÛŒ Ø­Ø§ØµÙ„ ÛÙˆ Ú†Ú©ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û” Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù ÙÙˆØ±ØªÚ¾ Ø¬Ù†Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø± Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û ØŒ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ø±Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÙ„ Ø§ØªØ­Ø§Ø¯ÛŒ ÛÛŒÚº Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ø§Ú© Ø§ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ù…Ø§ Ù†Û’ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ù…Ù†Û Ø³Û’ Ú©ÛØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ú©Û ÙˆÛ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù†ÛŒ Ù…ÛŒÚˆÛŒØ§ Ù…ÛŒÚº 50 Ù…Ù„ÛŒÙ† ÚˆØ§Ù„Ø± Ø³Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù†Û Ø®Ø±Ú† Ú©Ø±ÛŒÚº Ú¯Û’ Ø¢Ø¬ ØªÚ© Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ù†Û’ ÛŒÛ Ø³ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø§Ù¹Ú¾Ø§ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û Ú©Ø³ Ù…Ù‚ØµØ¯ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ú©Ù† Ú©Ùˆ ÛŒÛ Ø±Ù‚ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ø¯Ø§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ø¦Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ Ø¬Ø¨Ú©Û Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ø§ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù†ÛŒ Ù…ÛŒÚˆÛŒØ§ Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ø«Ø±ÙˆØ±Ø³ÙˆØ® Ø¯ÛŒÚ©Ú¾Ø§ Ø¬Ø§ Ø³Ú©ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”Û”Û”Û”Û” Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø³Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ù‚ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Ù† ÙÙˆØ±ØªÚ¾ Ø¬Ù†Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† ÙˆØ§Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø²Ø¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº ÛÛ’ Û”Û”Û”!!

( 96 )   Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend.

The shaer is relating to this aya from Surat Al Anmbiya.
But the shaer is not the tafseer of the aya. It is an resembles of the situation which have fallen upon the Muslim Umma these days.

The actual decending of people of Yajouj and Majouj is going to be something far far horrific than what the present situation is.

But Yajouj and Majouj were never destroyed.

We dont know who invented this formula. It is wonderful and un believabie.

Whether it is right or wrong u can try with ur cell phone number with the following procedure.

1) take last digit of ur cell number

2) multiply that number by 2

3) add 5 to the number arrived at

4) multiply that number by 50

5) add 1766 to the number u got

6) subtract ur year of birth from the number so obtained

7) u will get 3 digits number. The first is ur cell phone number's last digit and other two numbers r ur age.

Amazing!!!!!!

10/1/16, 4:08 AM - Waseem Choudry: ```Class for today...
Read it and tell me if you think the punishment part is right, we all know that not offering our prayers (salat) is HARAM! But little do we know the punishments that we will face...
Why do we erase messages that talk about religious (Islam) matters! 
But We resend ordinary messages? 

The Prophet peace be upon him narrated.
"Convey from me, even if its one verse (Ayah)" 
Maybe forwarding this message to others can be beneficial for your Intercession on the Day of Judgement.

The punishments of the one who doesn't pray.

The Prophet peace be upon him narrated: "Whoever shows heedlessness (negligence) in praying salat, Allah punishes them with fifteen kinds of punishments"

Six punishments in this lifetime.
Three punishments while dying.
Three punishments in the grave.
Three punishments on the day of Judgment.

Six punishments in this lifetime:
1 - Allah takes away blessings from his age,(makes his life misfortunate)
2 - Allah wipes out the virtues of righteous people from his face.
3 - Allah does not accept his Dua's.
4- He will be detested by all creatures on Earth.
5 - Allah does not award him for his good deeds.
6 - He will not be included in the prayer & Dua's of the righteous.
(good people)

Three punishments while dying.
1- He dies humiliated.
2-He dies hungry.
3- He dies thirsty. 
Even if he drinks the water of all the seas, he will still be thirsty.

Three punishments in the grave.
1- Allah tightens his grave until his chest, ribs come over each other.
2- Allah pours on him fire with embers (red colour, hot coal made of immensely heated firewood).
3- Allah sets on him a snake called "The Brave" "The Bold" which rolls all around his body & crushes him. 

Three punishments on the day of Judgment.
1- He will be dragged face down over hot burning coal to the hellfire.
2- Allah gives him an angry look that makes the flesh of his face fall down
3- Allah judges him strictly and orders him to be thrown in hell.

Those who do not offer their prayers of:

FAJR: 
The glow of their face is taken away.

DHUHR: 
The blessing of their income is taken away (even if he has millions, he will be poor).

ASR: 
There is no strength in their body.

MAGHRIB: 
They are not benefitted by their children.

ISHA: 
The peace of their sleep is taken away.

Select + copy + paste + send = The great reward of Allah.
It's your choice...!!!

The person who listens to music during the Adhan will be unable to recite the Shahadah while dying.

If you don't spread d knowledge, then it is your sins that stopped you 4rm doing so.
Please forward this & let us all get the reward.
Don't say "0k"
Say "In sha Allah"

Don't say "wow"
Say "SubhanAllah"

Don't say "great"
Say "Masha Allah"

Don't say "I am fine"
Say "Allahamdulillah"

Don't say "Thanks"
Say "Jazakallahu Khair"

Don't say "Take care bye"
Say "Fee Amanillah"

Don't say "Hello"
Say "Assalamu alaikkum Warahmatullah"

don't delete the msg pls frwd to all muslims. . . .

10/1/16, 3:01 PM - Asif Iqbal: *Pls share to other groups*
This is to awaken our security consciousness!!!.
A true life story is told of how armed robbers are snatching from unsuspecting people their vehicles nowadays.
In a wedding party or public gathering, they will meet the MC to make an announcement of a particular car with registration number so so and so, blocking them.
While you go out to move your car, some guys are waiting outside for you with a gun. They know you have the keys of your car.
You are then ordered to ride the car out of the compound with them inside already with you.
Please, Do the following when your vehicle registration number is being called out at a social function :
1) Take your time before going out.
2) Don't go out alone, at least in company of two or more people.
(3) Don't go directly to where the car is parked, at least to confirm from a distance if you are blocking another car truly.
And make sure there is a driver in the blocked car already before you go.
4) Watch your surroundings carefully before approaching the vehicle
Please copy and share even if u don't own a car and save a lot of people.

10/4/16, 4:23 AM - Imran Sohail: Adnan, 
I do not wish to start with the term "Dear" or "son", because I do not wish to acknowledge that you're either of those for me. I am a miserable soul and I do not wish to increase my torment here. 
Mr. Adnan, let me introduce myself to you, because you seem to have forgotten it all. Let me refresh your arrogance - fogged memory. 
I, am a Pakistan Air Force officer. I am the youngest recipient of Sitara Jurat. I am the recipient of the Medal of Honor from Iran, Turkey and Jordan. The Kings of these countries sought to honor me for my services. I am the recipient of multiple gallantry awards including the SJ and Sitara e Imtiaz, because I fought for my country in the 1965 war, valiantly so. I served three presidents as Aide de camp in my service, and I was taken up into foreign services after my retirement from the Airforce to represent my beloved land across the world. I made it to the 22nd grade, upto the post of Commissioner General, the first, I might add. 
Let me indulge deeper into flashback. When you were young and had a taste for music, I bought you your first Piano. You learnt to play and I was very proud of you. I arranged for you to travel across the country to different PAF bases in military aircrafts, requesting their base commanders to let you perform. They took you in with open arms, because of what your father meant to them. That, is where you started your music career from, performing in military bases, travelling on the expense of the PAF, who applauded you for your talents and provided you with opportunities.  
Coming back to the 1965 war that made your father who he was. The enemy was upon us. We were a few skilled men, and we had the weight of our country's entire population on our young shoulders. We gave it everything we had and we succeeded. Let me be clear; that was my country's debt on me. I was chosen for this honor, I owed my land more than my singular life. 
The enemy that I spoke of, Adnan, was the last five letters on your current address. It was the loathsome colors on the flag you hold. It was the anthem that you now believe in. It was the sound of oppression, the conflict of ideology and the arch nemesis of my beloved motherland. 
Soldiers, Adnan, think differently than you liberated and self centered men. For us, it is the sound of our anthem that brings us peace, the sight of our flag that brings us tranquility and the scent of our earth, that fuels our will to live. I cannot describe in any sufficient words how much my country means to me. 
The land that you proudly proclaim to be your home, is the land your unfortunate father almost died fighting against. The enmity between your home and mine is so deep rooted and so traumatizing, it is unimaginably treacherous to have even thought about creating a soft corner for the murderer of hundreds and thousands of our brothers, sisters, parents and children. And you, in pursuit of worldly gains (atleast that's what your incentive was) stepped on your father's name and repute to get to the other side. My blood is on the border that you crossed, Adnan. My friends in heaven heard you say Jai Hind. I thanked God in person, that He did not keep me alive to witness that moment. That he didn't make me stay long enough to exclaim your love for the armed forces that have killed my fellow soldiers. 
The world remembers me in honorable mentions. But I think I brought myself the worst disgrace that the universe has to offer. I brought you into this world, and whatever I may proclaim, you will always be a cancerous part of me. Deteriorating my honor, you will always be my deepest regret. 
Your miserable father, 
Sqn Ldr Arshad Sami 
SJ, SI(M)

ØªÛŒÙ† Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ú©ÛŒ Ù†Ø§Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ù„ ÛŒÙ‚ÛŒÙ† Ù…Ø¯Øª Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø§ØªÙ†Ø§ Ú©Ú†Ú¾ Ú©Ø± Ú†Ú©Ø§ ÛÛ’ Ú©Û Ø¬Ø³ Ø³Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ù‚ÙˆÙ… Ú©ÛŒ Ù†Ø³Ù„ÛŒÚº ÙÛŒØ¶ÛŒØ§Ø¨ ÛÙˆØ³Ú©ØªÛŒ ÛÛŒÚº ( Ø§Ú¯Ø± Ø¬Ù…ÛÙˆØ±ÛŒØª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒÙ¹ Ù†Û Ú†Ú‘Ú¾ Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒÚº ØªÙˆ) Û”Û”Û”Û”Û” !
 
Ø¨ÛØª Ú©Ù… Ù„ÙˆÚ¯ Ø¬Ø§Ù†ØªÛ’ ÛÙˆÙ†Ú¯Û’ Ú©Û Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ú†ÛŒÙ Ø¢Ù Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ø³Ù¹Ø§Ù Ø¨Ù†Ù†Û’ Ø³Û’ Ù¾ÛÙ„Û’ ÛÛŒ Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯Ùˆ Ø¨Ù†ÛŒØ§Ø¯ÛŒ ØªØ¨Ø¯ÛŒÙ„ÛŒØ§Úº Ú©ÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÚºÛ” Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒÙ† Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ÛŒ Ø­Ú©Ù…Øª Ø¹Ù…Ù„ÛŒ "Ú©ÙˆÙ„Úˆ Ø³Ù¹Ø§Ø±Ù¹ ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† " Ú©Û’ Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ø¨ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ù†Ø¨ Ø³Û’ " Ø¹Ø¸Ù… Ù†Ùˆ " Ù…Ø´Ù‚ÙˆÚº Ú©Ø§ Ø¢ØºØ§Ø² Ø§Ø³ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ú©Ø±ÙˆØ§ÛŒØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø§ØµØ±Ø§Ø± Ù¾Ø± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ù„Ú‘Ù†Û’ ÙˆØ§Ù„Û’ Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÙˆÚº Ú©Ùˆ Ø§ÙˆÙ„ÛŒÙ† Ø®Ø·Ø±Û Ù‚Ø±Ø§Ø± Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§Û”
 
Ø§Ø³ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú©ÙˆÙ„Úˆ Ø³Ù¹Ø§Ø±Ù¹ Ú©Û’ Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ù„Û’ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ú†Ú¾ÙˆÙ¹Û’ Ø§ÛŒÙ¹Ù…ÛŒ ÛØªÚ¾ÛŒØ§Ø±ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ ØªÛŒØ§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ù…Ú©Ù…Ù„ Ú©ÛŒ Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒÙ† Ú©ÙˆÙ„Úˆ Ø³Ù¹Ø§Ø±Ù¹ ÚˆØ§Ú©Ù¹Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ù† Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ø±Ø¨ÙˆÚº ÚˆØ§Ù„Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø³Ø±Ù…Ø§ÛŒÛ Ú©Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± 30 Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø­Ù†Øª Ø¶Ø§Ø¦Ø¹ ÛÙˆ Ú†Ú©ÛŒ ÛÛ’Û”
 
Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ ÛÛŒ Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ø¶Ø±Ø¨ Ø¹Ø¶Ø¨ Ú©Û’ Ø§ØµÙ„ Ù…Ø§Ø³Ù¹Ø± Ù…Ø§Ø¦Ù†Úˆ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…Ø¹Ù…Ø§Ø± ÛÛŒÚº Û” Ú©ÛØ§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Ú©Û ÙˆØ²ÛŒØ±Ø§Ø¹Ø¸Ù… ØªÚ© Ú©Ùˆ Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ ÛÙˆÙ†Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø¯Ù† Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø¢Ú¯Ø§Û Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§Û” Ø§Ø³ Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø°Ø±ÛŒØ¹Û’ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø¨Ú¾Ø± Ø³Û’ Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ ØªÙ‚Ø±ÛŒØ¨Ø§Ù‹ ØªÙ…Ø§Ù… Ù…Ø±Ø§Ú©Ø² ØµØ§Ù Ú©Ø± Ø¯Ø¦ÛŒÛ’ Ú¯Ø¦Û’ ÛÛŒÚº Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ù‚Ø¨Ø¶Û’ Ø³Û’ Ø³Ø§Ø±Û’ Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù‚Û’ Ú†Ú¾Ú‘Ø§ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ú¯Ø¦Û’ ÛÛŒÚºÛ”
 
Ø§Ø³ Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ú©Û’ Ù†ØªÛŒØ¬Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ù†Û’ Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ù… Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÛŒ Ú©Û’Ø°Ø±ÛŒØ¹Û’ Ø¬Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Ù† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ø±Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÙ„ÛŒ Ù¾Ø±Ø§Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ú¯ Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Ø§Ú©Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ù†Ø§ Ø¯ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’Û”
 
Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ú©Û’ Ø­Ú©Ù… Ù¾Ø± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù†Û’ Ù¾ÛÙ„ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©ÛŒ Ù¾Ù†Ø§Û Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÙˆÚº Ú©Ø§ Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† ØªÚ© Ù¾ÛŒÚ†Ú¾Ø§ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù†ÛŒ ÛÛŒÙ„ÛŒ Ú©Ø§Ù¾Ù¹Ø±Ø² Ù†Û’ Ú©Ù†Ú‘ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø±Ø§Ú©Ø² Ù¾Ø± Ú©Ø§Ù…ÛŒØ§Ø¨ Ø­Ù…Ù„Û’ Ú©ÛŒÛ’ Û”
 
Ù¾Ø´Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø­Ù…Ù„Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ø¨Ø·ÙˆØ± Ú†ÛŒÙ Ø¢Ù Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ø³Ù¹Ø§Ù Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Ø§ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø·ÙˆÙØ§Ù†ÛŒ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Û Ú©ÛŒØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ø¬Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø¨ÛŒÙ†Û Ø·ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø± Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù† Ø­Ú©ÙˆÙ…Øª Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ø¯Ø´Ù…Ù†ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ù¾Ø´Øª Ù¾Ù†Ø§ÛÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ù¾Ø± "Ù…ÙˆØ«Ø±" ÙˆØ§Ø±Ù†Ù†Ú¯ Ø¯ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù†ØªØ§Ø¦Ø¬ Ø³Û’ Ø®Ø¨Ø±Ø¯Ø§Ø± Ú©ÛŒØ§Û” Ø³Ø§ØªÚ¾ ÛÛŒ Ø§Ø³ Ø¨Ø§Øª Ù¾Ø± Ù‚Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø§Ù†Ø¯Ø± Ø§ÛŒÙ†Ù¹Ù„ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ø³ Ø¢Ù¾Ø±ÛŒØ´Ù† Ú©Ø±Û’ Ú¯Ø§ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ù†ØªÛŒØ¬Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù† Ø­Ú©ÙˆÙ…Øª Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø§ÛŒÙ†Ù¹Ù„ÛŒ Ø¬Ù†Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ Ù†Ø´Ø§Ø¯ÛÛŒ Ù¾Ø± Ù¾Ø´Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø³Ú©ÙˆÙ„ Ø­Ù…Ù„Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ù„ÙˆØ« 5 Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ Ú¯Ø±ÙØªØ§Ø± Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ù¾Ú‘Û’ Û” 

Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù† Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÚˆØ± Ú©Ø§ Ù‚ÛŒØ§Ù… Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù† Ù…ÛØ§Ø¬Ø±ÛŒÙ† Ú©ÛŒ ÙˆØ§Ù¾Ø³ÛŒ Ú©Ø§ Ù†Ø§Ù…Ù…Ú©Ù† Ú©Ø§Ù… Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø³Û’ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ú†Ú¾ÙˆÙ¹ÛŒ Ø³ÛŒ Ø¬Ú¾Ú‘Ù¾ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒÛ” Ù„ÛŒÚ©Ù† Ø¢Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û ÛŒÛ Ú©Ø§Ù… Ù†ÛØ§ÛŒØª ØªÛŒØ²ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ú©Ø§Ù…ÛŒØ§Ø¨ÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø¬Ø§Ø±ÛŒ ÛÛ’Û” Ø¬Ù…ÛÙˆØ±ÛŒ Ù„ÛŒÚˆØ±ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ ØªÙ…Ø§Ù… ØªØ± ØªØ­ÙØ¸Ø§Øª Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø§Ø¬ÙˆØ¯Û” 
ÛŒÛ Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø§ÛŒØ³Ø§ Ú©Ø§Ù… Ú©Ø± Ú©Û’ Ø¬Ø§ Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ù¾Ú†Ú¾Ù„Û’ 70 Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ø³Û’ Ø§ÙØºØ§Ù†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø³Û’ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº ÛÙˆÙ†ÛŒ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÛŒ Ø¯Ø±Ø§Ù†Ø¯Ø§Ø²ÛŒÙˆÚº Ú©Ø§ Ø³Ù„Ø³Ù„Û Ø±Ú© Ø¬Ø§Ø¦ÛŒØ¦Ú¯Ø§Û” 

Ø³ÛŒØ§Ø³Øª Ø¯Ø§Ù†ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ ØªÙ…Ø§Ù… ØªØ± ØªØ­ÙØ¸Ø§Øª Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø§ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ Ø§Ù†Ú©Ùˆ Ø³Ø²Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ù…ÙˆØª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø­Ø§Ù„ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ú©ÙˆØ±Ù¹Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ù‚ÛŒØ§Ù… Ù¾Ø± Ù…Ø¬Ø¨ÙˆØ± Ú©ÛŒØ§Û” Ø¬Ø³ Ù¾Ø± Ø¨Ø¹Ø¶ Ø³ÛŒØ§Ø³Øª Ø¯Ø§Ù† Ø±Ùˆ Ù¾Ú‘Û’ ØªÚ¾Û’Û” 

Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ø¢Ø¨Ø§Ø¯ Ú©Û’ Ù‚Ø±ÛŒØ¨ ÛÙˆÙ†Û’ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÛŒ " Ø¬Ù…ÛÙˆØ±ÛŒ Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø° Ø¢Ø±Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ " Ø¬Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù„ÙˆÚ¯ Ù…Ø± Ø±ÛÛ’ ØªÚ¾Û’ ØªÙˆ Ù…Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„Øª Ú©Ø± Ú©Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ùˆ Ø±ÙˆÚ© Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Û” Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„Øª Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø­Ú©ÙˆÙ…Øª Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…Ø¸Ø§ÛØ±ÛŒÙ† Ø¯ÙˆÙ†ÙˆÚº Ù¹Ú¾Ù†ÚˆÛ’ ÛÙˆÚ¯Ø¦Û’ Û”Û”Û”Û”
 
Ù…Ù„Ú© Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾ÛŒÙ¹Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ù†Ø§ÛŒØ§Ø¨ ÛÙˆ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ ØªÙˆ Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø² Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ø³Û’ " Ø§ÛÙ… Ù…Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø§Øª " Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ ÙÙˆØ±Ø§Ù‹ ÛÛŒ Ù…Ù„Ú© Ø¨Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø±Û Ù¾ÛŒÙ¹Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ø¯Ø³ØªÛŒØ§Ø¨ ÛÙˆÚ¯ÛŒØ§Û”
Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¹Ø§ØµÙ… Ø¨Ø§Ø¬ÙˆÛ Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¨Ø±Ø·Ø§Ù†ÛŒÛ ÛŒØ§ØªØ±Ø§ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø³ÙØ§Ø±ØªÛŒ Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø° Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Û’ Ø¯Ø± Ù¾Û’ Ø¬Ú¾Ù¹Ú©Û’ Ù„Ú¯Û’ Û”Û”Û”Û”Ù…Ø¹Ø±ÙˆÙ ØµØ­Ø§ÙÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§ÛŒÙ†Ú©Ø± ØµØ§Ø¨Ø± Ø´Ø§Ú©Ø± Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø·Ø§Ø¨Ù‚ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Û’ Ù¾Ø± Ø¢Ø¦Û’ ÛÙˆØ¦Û’ Ø¬Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø§Ø³ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ø­ÛŒØ±Ø§Ù† Ø±Û Ú¯Ø¦Û’ Ø¬Ø¨ Ø§Ù†Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÙÙˆØ¬ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ù†Ø¨ Ø³Û’ " ÙØ¶Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û " Ú©ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒÙ† Ø¬Ù†Ø±Ù„ Ø³Û’ Ú¯ÙØªÚ¯Ùˆ Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø¦ÛŒ Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒÙ† Ø¬Ù†Ø±Ù„ Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø§Ù…ÛŒØ± Ú©Ùˆ ÛØ¯Ø§ÛŒØ§Øª Ø¯Û’ Ø±ÛØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Û” Ø³Ø§ØªÚ¾ ÛÛŒ Ø§Ù† Ú©Ùˆ Ú©Ø¦ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§ÛŒØ³Û’ Ù†Ø§Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ù„ ØªØ±Ø¯ÛŒØ¯ Ø´ÙˆØ§ÛØ¯ Ù¾ÛŒØ´ Ú©ÛŒÛ’ Ú¯Ø¦Û’ Ø¬Ù† Ø³Û’ Ø«Ø§Ø¨Øª ÛÙˆØªØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ú©Û Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¨ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒÙ„ Ø§Û’ Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ù†Ù¹Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ú©Ø± Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’ Û” Ø§Ù†Ú©Û’ Ø¹Ù„Ø§ÙˆÛ Ø¬Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ Ù¹Ú¾ÙˆØ³ Ø´ÙˆØ§ÛØ¯ Ù¾ÛŒØ´ Ú©ÛŒÛ’ Ú¯Ø¦Û’ Ú©Û Ø§ÛŒÙ„ Ø§Ùˆ Ø³ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù ÙˆØ±Ø²ÛŒ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ù†Ø¨ Ø³Û’ ÛÙˆ Ø±ÛÛŒ ÛÛ’Û”
 
Ø¬Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø¬ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒÚ† Ú©ÛŒÙˆ Ú©Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø³Ø®Øª Ø¨Û’ Ú†ÛŒÙ†ÛŒ Ù¾Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø­ÛŒØ±Øª ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒ Ú©Û Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Û’ Ù„Ù…Ø¨Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø¬Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ ÙˆØ¹Ø¯Û’ Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø·Ø§Ø¨Ù‚ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Ùˆ Ú©ÙˆØ¦ÛŒ " Ø³Ø®Øª Ù¾ÛŒØºØ§Ù… " Ø¯ÛŒÙ†Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¬Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù†ÛŒ Ù…ÙˆÙ‚Ù Ú©ÛŒ ØªØ§Ø¦ÛŒØ¯ Ú©ÛŒÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒ ØŸØŸ
 
Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ù† Ú©ÙˆØ´Ø´ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ Ù†ØªÛŒØ¬Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ù…Ø±ÛŒÚ©Û Ù†Û’ Ù¾ÛÙ„ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¹ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø§Ù…ÛŒØ± " Ù…Ù„Ø§ ÙØ¶Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û " Ú©Ùˆ Ù…Ø¬Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù‹ Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ ØªØ³Ù„ÛŒÙ… Ú©Ø± Ù„ÛŒØ§ Û” Ø¬Ø³ Ù¾Ø± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ùˆ Ù…Ø²ÛŒØ¯ ØªÚ©Ù„ÛŒÙ ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒ Û” 

Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ù‚Ø·Ø± Ú©Û’ Ø´ÛŒØ® Ø³Û’ Ø§ÛÙ… Ù…Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø§Øª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ù‚Ø·Ø± Ù†Û’ Ú©Ú†Ú¾ Ø§ÛŒØ³Û’ ÙÛŒØµÙ„Û’ Ú©ÛŒÛ’ Ø¬Ùˆ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©Ùˆ Ø³Ø®Øª Ù†Ø§Ú¯ÙˆØ§Ø± Ú¯Ø²Ø±Û’Û”
 
Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÚ†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú†Ø§Ù„ÛŒØ³ Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø­Ù†Øª Ù¾Ø± Ù¾Ø§Ù†ÛŒ Ù¾Ú¾ÛŒØ± Ø¯ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’Û” ÙˆÛØ§Úº Ù†Û ØµØ±Ù Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÛŒ Ø®ØªÙ… ÛÙˆ Ú©Ø± Ø±Û Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ø¨Ù„Ú©Û Ø¢Ø¬ Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÚ†Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø²Ù†Ø¯Û Ø¨Ø§Ø¯ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù†ÚˆÛŒØ§ Ù…Ø±Ø¯Û Ø¨Ø§Ø¯ Ú©Û’ Ù†Ø¹Ø±ÙˆÚº Ø³Û’ Ú¯ÙˆÙ†Ø¬ Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’Û” 

Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ ØªØ§Ø±ÛŒØ® Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø±Ø§ Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø¨ Ø³Û’ Ø²ÛŒØ§Ø¯Û Ø§ÛŒØ¬Ù†Ù¹ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ú¯Ø±ÙØªØ§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ø¦ÛŒ Ø¬Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú©Ù„ Ø¨Ú¾ÙˆØ´ ÛŒØ§Ø¯ÛŒÙˆ Ø¬ÛŒØ³Û’ Ø§Ø¹Ù„ÛŒ ØªØ±ÛŒÙ† Ø¹ÛØ¯ÙˆÚº Ù¾Ø± ÙØ§Ø¦Ø² Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø§Ø³Ù¹Ø± Ù…Ø§Ø¦Ù†ÚˆØ² Ú©Ùˆ Ú¯Ø±ÙØªØ§Ø± Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§Û” 

Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ú©ÛŒ Ù‚ÛŒØ§Ø¯Øª Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ø¢Ø±Ù…ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ø§ÛŒÙ… Ú©ÛŒÙˆ Ø§ÛŒÙ… Ú©Û’ Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù Ú¯Ú¾ÛŒØ±Ø§ ØªÙ†Ú¯ Ú©Ø± Ø¯ÛŒØ§Û” Ø¢Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù Ø­ÛŒØ³Ù† Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ØŒ ØºØ¯Ø§Ø± Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…Ù„Ú© Ø¯Ø´Ù…Ù† Ú©Û’ Ø·ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø± Ù¾ÙˆØ±ÛŒ Ø¯Ù†ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø§Ù…Ù†Û’ Ø¨Û’ Ù†Ù‚Ø§Ø¨ ÛÙˆ Ú†Ú©Ø§ ÛÛ’Û” Ø§ÛŒÙ… Ú©ÛŒÙˆ Ø§ÛŒÙ… Ú©ÛŒ Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ø¯ÙˆÙ†ÙˆÚº Ú©Ø§ Ø®Ø§ØªÙ…Û Ú©Ø± Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’Û” Ø¨ÛØª Ø³ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ú¯Ø±ÙØªØ§Ø±ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù„Ø§ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§ Ú†Ú©Ø§ ÛÛ’Û” 

Ø¯ÙˆØ³Ø±ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø§Ø³ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ù†Û’ Ù¾ÛŒÙ¾Ù„Ø² Ù¾Ø§Ø±Ù¹ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ù¾Ø´Ù† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¯ÛØ´Øª Ú¯Ø±Ø¯ÛŒ Ù¾Ø± Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø¢ÛÙ†ÛŒ Ø´Ú©Ù†Ø¬Û Ú©Ø³Ø§ ÛÙˆØ§ ÛÛ’Û” Ù¾ÛŒÙ¾Ù„Ø² Ù¾Ø§Ø±Ù¹ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ø¹Ù„ÛŒ ØªØ±ÛŒÙ† Ù‚ÛŒØ§Ø¯Øª Ø³Ù…ÛŒØª Ø¨ÛØª Ø³Û’ Ø§Ø±Ø§Ú©ÛŒÙ† Ù…ÙØ±ÙˆØ± ÛÛŒÚºÛ” Ú†Ù†Ø¯ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ú©Ùˆ Ú¯Ø±ÙØªØ§Ø± Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’Û” Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¨Ø§Ù‚ÛŒ "Ø¬Ù…ÛÙˆØ±ÛŒØª Ú©ÛŒ Ù¾Ù†Ø§Û" Ù…ÛŒÚº ÛÛŒÚº Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø±Ø§Ø­ÛŒÙ„ Ø´Ø±ÛŒÙ Ú©Û’ Ø¬Ø§Ù†Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¯Ù† Ú¯Ù† Ø±ÛÛ’ ÛÛŒÚºÛ”

10/8/16, 10:08 AM - Mohammad Ali: salaam....

fasting on 9th & 10th Muharram...
 
Monday 9th & Tuesday  10th Oct in UAE

Tuesday 10th Oct & Wednesday 11 Oct in Pakistan
The Virtues of Fasting 'Ashura'

Ibn 'Abbas (may Allah be pleased with them both) said:

"I never saw the Messenger of Allah (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) so keen to fast any day and give it priority over any other than this day, the day of 'Ashura', and this month, meaning Ramadhan."Reported by Al-Bukhari, 1867
 
2, Sawm Muharram]

Ibn Qudamah (may Allah have mercy on him) said: "'Ashura' is the tenth day of Muharram. This is the opinion of Sa'id ibn al-Musayyib and al-Hasan. It was what was reported by Ibn 'Abbas, who said: 'The Messenger of Allah (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) commanded us to fast'Ashura', the tenth day of Muharram.' [Reported by at-Tirmidhi, who said, a sahih hasan hadith] It was reported that Ibn 'Abbas said: 'The ninth,' and reported that the Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) used to fast the ninth. [Reported by Muslim] 'Ata' reported that he said, 'Fast the ninth and the tenth, and do not be like the Jews.' If this is understood, we can say on this basis that it is mustahabb (encouraged) to fast on the ninth and the tenth, for that reason.

Muslim Judicial Council (MJC) and IQSA has withdrawn certification from McDonald's. Acccording to the kitchen office in Florida,United States, study into the McDonald's ingredients has shown positive evidence of PORK materials which is called"LM10" are used in  McDonald's mayo, fries seasoning and oil.
McDonald's officials have confirmed that all sauce based ingredients are imported have pork based products the US.(Muslim) consumers are advised to abstain from McDonald's. Muslim Judicial Council (MJC) and IQSA has also withdrawn certification countrywide.

A Pakistani goes to Walmart in the U.S. 

He finds cat food at special prices. 

He picks a dozen cans of cat food & goes to check out.

The Manager gets suspicious. He thinks that this guy might not have a cat & will probably feed cat food to his kids. He asks the pakistani to show him his cat before he could let him have cat food.

He goes home & returns with a cat & gets to buy the cat food.

Next week the Pakistani finds dog food at special prices.

He gets to buy the dog food.

1. A talk was delivered by Major General Dr Azhar Mahmood Kayani, a renowned cardiologist, on *Prevention of Heart Diseases*, at NUST . The guest speaker introduced to the audience a very handy kit which may protect a person from dying of sudden heart attack. It has following items :-
 a. Tab Disprin  â€“ 4
 b. Tab Angisid  â€“ 4
 c. Deponit NT5 skin patch  â€“ 1
2. The worthy professor elaborated that if one feels sudden tightness and pain in centre of chest, radiating to left arm or both sides of neck, accompanied by sweating and uneasiness, one is likely to be in a state of heart attack. Following measures must be taken immediately :-
 a. Keeping one Angisid tablet under the tongue.
 b. Chewing one Disprin tablet.
 c. Pealing of and sticking the Deponit NT5 skin patch on left side of chest.
3.  The items of this kit cost about Rs 50-55, without any specific expert handling but can definitely save a person from dying immediately of a heart attack.
4.  It is advised that every individual, above 40 years of age, must prepare a kit of his / her own and should always carry inside oneâ€™s pocket (hand-bag â€“ in case of ladies).
5. Please disseminate the contents of the message to all about whom you care.

A driver was stuck in a traffic jam on the road outside Parliament, Islamabad.

Suddenly, a man knocks on the window.

"Terrorists have kidnapped the entire Pakistani politicians , and they're asking for a $100 million dollar ransom.

10/14/16, 12:06 PM - Imran Farhat: âœâœâœ
_one of the new features_ on
 *WhatsApp*

Now you can type in 
*bold*
_italic_
and
~striked out~

Here's how
Put * before and after the word(s) to make them bold
Put _ before and after the word(s) to make them italic
Put ~ before and after the word(s) to strike them out.      
Try it...with your repliesğŸ‘

10/14/16, 11:30 PM - Shakil Ahmed: Questioner (continued): One other question that is about the mosques in this country. You say that 80% of them are run by the extremists, I wonder what you mean by that.
Shaykh Kabbani: 80% of them have been being run by the extremist ideology, but not acting as a militant movement. We don't know if this will lead in the future to be more in the hands of militant extremism or not. There are two kinds of extremism: there is the extremism ideology and there is the extremist militant movement. In the future some of them might be working or affiliating themselves with such kinds of militant extremism.
Questioner (continued): You said, on the other hand, that most American Muslims are peace loving, yet their mosques are being run by these extremists?
Shaykh Kabbani: Muslims, in general, are peace loving and tolerant. And a Muslim likes to go and find a place to go and make his service, make his worship and go and doesn't interfere. So the board of trustees of these mosques is being run by these extremists.

I am going to My Mom's Place for 6-7 days with kids &

Our newspaper vendor is different from theirs.. 
And our laundry person and milkman are also different. 

6 - Your Underwear are on left side of wardrobe and on right side are kid's...

ïºïº ïºïº± ïº‘ï»®ï®Œï®¬ï®¯ ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ï¯¿ï­©ï®¯ ï»§ï®¯ ïº‘ï®­ï¯½ ï»Ÿï»®ï®”ï»®ï® ï®ï®¯ ïº³ïºØªÚ¾ ï»£ï» ï®ïº® ïºïº± ï®ï»® ï­˜ï®‘ï® Ù„ÛŒØ§ ïºï»­ïº­ Ø³Ø¨ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ùˆ ï»Ÿï®¯ ï®ïº® Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ï®ï®¯ ï­˜ïºØ³ ï­˜ï®©ï»¨ï­» ï®”ïºŒï®¯ØŒØŒØŒØŒ

10/25/16, 7:58 AM - Mashood Yunus: I totally agree with this.  I am making a suggestion in good spirits and I pray May Allah enable me to explain myself with clarity. It is just a suggestion and u can all feel free to totally ignore it.  I mean no offence. I request u to read it all before responding. 

 People should have liberty to raise any topic but both sides should also hear each other out like we usually do alhamdulillah. For example, in political topics, the news clippings from amer have full support from me but I also see some valid points in what aqeel and ahmer say and answers should be shared for mutual mental enlightenment. I want to hear both sides and *I love it* if I do not agree with other party.  However IF naveed or Faraz kashif or shakil or adnan or haroon or any of the monitors (I explained this idea in next paragraph) ... *anyone else wants to drop topic*, I and other group should respect and drop the topic respecting others wishes. We can move the topic to political forum created 3 weeks ago.  

We might raise the issue another day and might have to drop it again using same process but at least we will have a process in place. 

So I also suggest we choose few "monitors" who be authorized and respected so they can remind us to *drop* the topic.  For example when a deeper political discussion starts smelling  of serious disagreements, this "monitor" be able to have the topic dropped.  ... And from what we know so far, during political discussion, I or amir or aqeel or ahmer cannot be monitors we need shakil or faraz or ali or .... To step in as monitors.  

Similarly I will love to be monitor for the jokes sessions ğŸ˜ˆ because  R and XXX rated jokes were posted in past few days but some of u must decide if I should be monitor, not me ...

I hope I made sense

One day his mother went to check out how he is doing at school and the teacher told her honestly that her son is simply a disaster, getting very low marks and never had she seen such a dumb boy in her whole career...

The mother could not accept such a feed back and she took her son out from that school. she even shifted to another city ...

25 years later, that teacher got a cardio disorder and all the doctors have advised her to go for an open heart operation which only one surgeon could perform..

Left with no other choice she did it and the surgery was successful ...when she opened her eyes, she saw a handsome doctor smiling to her, being under anesthesia effect, she wanted to thank him but could not talk, in turn, he was staring at her face which started turning blue, she was raising her hand trying to tell him some thing but in vain and eventually died...

The doctor was shocked and was trying to understand what just happened, till he turned back and saw our friend Basheer working as a cleaner in that hospital who had unplugged the ventilator to connect his vacuum cleaner......      
                 
If you were thinking that Basheer became a doctor, its because you have been watching too many movies, serials or have read too many motivational forwarded messages.. ğŸ˜‚

ÛÙ… Ù†Û’ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù…ÛŒ Ø§Ù‚Ø¯Ø§Ø± Ú©Ùˆ Ø®ØªÙ… Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø´ÛŒØ·Ø§Ù†ÛŒ Ù…Ø¬Ø§Ù„Ø³ Ú©Ùˆ ÙØ±ÙˆØº Ø¯ÛŒÙ†Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø³Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ù‚ÙˆØªÛŒÚº ØµØ±Ù Ú©Ø± Ø¯ÛŒÚºÛ” ÛÙ… ØµØ±Ù Ù†Ø§Ù… Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø³Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù† ØªÚ¾Û’Û” Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù…ÛŒ Ø±ÙˆØ­ Ú©Û’ Ø¨ØºÛŒØ± Ø¸Ø§ÛØ±ÛŒ Ø­Ø¯ ØªÚ© Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ú©ØªÙ†Û’ ÛÛŒ ÛŒÙˆØ±Ù¾ÛŒ Ù…Ù…Ø§Ù„Ú© Ú©Ø§ Ø³ÙØ± Ú©ÛŒØ§ Û” ÙˆÛØ§Úº Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ù¹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú¯Ø§ØªØ§ Ø±ÛØ§ØŒ ØµÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù„ Ú©Û’ Ø¢Ø±Ù¹ Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ø¬Ø§Ú¯Ø± Ú©Ø±ØªØ§ Ø±ÛØ§ØŒ Ù…ØºØ±Ø¨ Ú©Ùˆ Ø®ÙˆØ´ Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ú©Û ÛÙ… ØªØ±Ù‚ÛŒ Ù¾Ø³Ù†Ø¯ Ù‚ÙˆÙ… ÛÛŒÚº Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ø§ÛŒÙ…Ø§Ù† Ú©Ø§ØŒ Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ú©Ø§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù‚ Ú©Ø§ Ø¬Ù†Ø§Ø²Û Ù†Ú©Ù„ØªØ§ Ú¯ÛŒØ§ Ù…Ú¯Ø± Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¬ÛŒØ¨ Ø¨Ú¾Ø±ØªÛŒ Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒÛ”

"Ø´Ø§Ø¯ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚºØŒ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ ÛŒÛ Ù…Ø­Ø³ÙˆØ³ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ø§ØªÙ†ÛŒ Ø²ÛŒØ§Ø¯Û Ø®ÙˆØ´ Ùˆ Ø®Ø±Ù… Ù†ÛÛŒÚº ÛÛ’ Ø¬ØªÙ†Ø§ Ú©Û Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ø¬ÛŒØ³Û’ Ù…Ø¹Ø±ÙˆÙ Ø¢Ø¯Ù…ÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø´Ø§Ø¯ÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ù„Ú‘Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ Ø®ÙˆØ´ Ø§ÙˆØ± ÙØ®Ø±ÛÙˆÙ†Ø§ Ú†Ø§ÛÛŒÛ’Û” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ ÙØ·Ø±ÛŒ Ø­ÛŒØ§ Ù¾Ø± Ù…Ø­Ù…ÙˆÙ„ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ú©Ø¦ÛŒ Ù…Ø±ØªØ¨Û Ø¯ÛŒÚ©Ú¾Ø§ Ú©Û Ø¬Ø¨ ØµØ¨Ø­ Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ø¢ØªØ§ ÛÙˆÚº ØªÙˆ Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ø¬Ø§Ú¯ Ø±ÛÛŒ ÛÙˆØªÛŒ ÛÛ’ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¹Ù…ÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù‹ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Û’ ÛØ§ØªÚ¾ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù‚Ø±Ø¢Ù† Ù¾Ø§Ú© ÛÙˆØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ø³Û’ ÙˆÛ Ù¾Ú‘Ú¾ Ø±ÛÛŒ ÛÙˆØªÛŒ ÛÛ’Û” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ú©Ø± Ø§Ø³Û’ Ø¨Ú‘Û’ Ø¬ÙˆØ´ÛŒÙ„Û’ Ø§Ù†Ø¯Ø§Ø² Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ø³ Ø±Ø§Øª Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ø§Ø±Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ø³Ù†Ø§ØªØ§Û” Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ù¾Ø±Ø³ØªØ§Ø±ÙˆÚº Ú©ÛŒ Ú†Ø§ÛØª Ø³Û’ Ø¢Ú¯Ø§Û Ú©Ø±ØªØ§Û” Ø¢Ø¬ Ú©ØªÙ†ÛŒ Ù„Ú‘Ú©ÛŒÙˆÚº Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù„Ú‘Ú©ÛŒÙˆÚº Ú©Û’ ÙÙˆÙ† Ø¢Ø¦Û’ Ø¬Ùˆ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ ÙÙ† Ú©Û’ Ø´ÛŒØ¯Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ ÛÛŒÚºÛ” Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ø§Ù† Ø¨Ø§ØªÙˆÚº Ú©Ùˆ Ù†Ø§Ú¯ÙˆØ§Ø±ÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø³Ù†ØªÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ ÛØ¯Ø§ÛŒØª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¯Ø¹Ø§ Ú©Ø±ØªÛŒÛ” Ø§Ø³ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº ÙØ¬Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ø°Ø§Ù† ÛÙˆØ¬Ø§ØªÛŒ Ø§ÙˆØ± ÙˆÛ Ù…ØµÙ„Û’ Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø¨Ú‘Ú¾ Ø¬Ø§ØªÛŒØŒ Ø¬Ø¨ Ú©Û Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ù¾Ú‘Ú¾Û’ Ø¨ØºÛŒØ± ÛÛŒ Ø³Ùˆ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§Û” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¬Ø¨ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ø§Ø³ Ø³Û’ Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ù¹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ú©Ø§ Ø°Ú©Ø± Ú©Ø±ØªØ§ØŒ ÙˆÛØ§Úº Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§ØªÛŒÚº Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù†Ø§ØŒ Ø§Ù¾Ù†ÛŒ Ú©Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ Ú©Ø§ Ø°Ú©Ø± Ú©Ø±ØªØ§ØŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙ†Ú© Ø¨ÛŒÙ„Ù†Ø³ Ú©Ø§ Ø±Ø¹Ø¨ Ø¬Ù…Ø§ØªØ§ ØªÙˆ ÙˆÛ Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ø¨Ø§Ù‹ Ú©ÛØªÛŒ: "Ø±Ø§Ø²Ù‚ ØªÙˆ ØµØ±Ù Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ú©ÛŒ Ø°Ø§Øª ÛÛ’"

"ÛÙ…Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø´Ø§Ø¯ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ù†Ú† Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ú¯Ø²Ø± Ú†Ú©Û’ ØªÚ¾Û’Û” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø³Ù„Ø³Ù„ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ ÙÙ† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø¨ØªÙ„Ø§ Ø§ÙˆØ± ÙØ³Ù‚ Ùˆ ÙØ¬ÙˆØ± Ù…ÛŒÚº ÚˆÙˆØ¨Ø§ ÛÙˆØ§ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¹Ø¨Ø§Ø¯Øª Ú©Û’ Ø¨ØºÛŒØ± Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±ØªØ§ Ø±ÛØ§ Ù¾Ú¾Ø± Ø§Ú†Ø§Ù†Ú© ÛÙ…Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§ÛŒÚ© ÛÙ†Ú¯Ø§Ù…Û Ø¨Ø±Ù¾Ø§ ÛÙˆØ§Û” ÛŒÛ 1988Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Øª ÛÛ’ØŒ Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾ Ø³Û’ Ú©ÛØ§:"Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ø³ Ø´Ø®Øµ Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø§ØªÚ¾ ÛØ±Ú¯Ø² Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±Ø³Ú©ØªÛŒ Ø¬Ùˆ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ø±Ø¨ Ú©Ø§ ÙˆÙØ§Ø¯Ø§Ø± Ù†ÛÛŒÚºØŒ Ø¬Ùˆ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ø§Ø¯Ø§ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ú©Ø±ØªØ§ Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ Ø­Ø±Ø§Ù… ÛÛ’ Ø¬Ùˆ ÙØ¬Ø± Ú©Û’ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ø¢ØªØ§ ÛÛ’ Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ ÙˆÛÙ… Ùˆ Ú¯Ù…Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø¢Ø³Ú©ØªØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ú©Û Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ø§ÛŒØ³Ø§ Ø³ÙˆÚ† Ø³Ú©ØªÛŒ ÛÛ’Û” Ø¨ÛØ±Ø­Ø§Ù„ Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù„Ú‘Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ ÛÙˆÚ¯Ø¦ÛŒÛ” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§ØªÛŒÚº Ø³Ù†ÛŒ Ø§Ù† Ø³Ù†ÛŒ Ú©Ø± Ø¯ÛŒÚº

"Ú©Ú†Ú¾ Ø¯Ù† Ú¯Ø²Ø±Û’ØŒ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø¯Ù† Ø¬Ø¨ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„ ÛÙˆØ§ ØªÙˆ ÙØ¬Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø§Ø°Ø§Ù† ÛÙˆØ±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÛ” Ø´ÛØ± Ú©ÛŒ Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¬Ø¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ø°Ø§Ù†ÛŒÚº Ø¨Ù„Ù†Ø¯ ÛÙˆØ±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÚºÛ” ÛØ± Ø·Ø±Ù Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ø§Ú©Ø¨Ø±Û”Û”Û”Ø§Ø´Ú¾Ø¯ Ø§Ù† Ù„Ø§ Ø§Ù„Û Ø§Ù„Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ø­ÛŒ Ø¹Ù„ÛŒ Ø§Ù„ØµÙ„Ø§Ø© Ú©ÛŒ Ú¯ÙˆÙ†Ø¬ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÛ” Ø¬Ø¨ Ø³ÙˆÙ†Û’ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ú©Ù…Ø±Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¬Ø§Ù†Û’ Ù„Ú¯Ø§ ØªÙˆ Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ú©ÛØ§: "Ø¢Ù¾ Ù…Ø³Ø¬Ø¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ú©ÛŒÙˆÚº Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø¬Ø§ØªÛ’ØŸ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø¢Ù¾ Ù†Û’ Ø§Ø°Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø² Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø³Ù†ÛŒØŸ"

Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ù…ÛŒÚº ÛŒÛ Ù¾ÛÙ„Ø§ Ù…ÙˆÙ‚Ø¹ ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ú©Û Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ú©ÛØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§Û” Ø§Ø³ Ù„Ù…Ø­Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø®ÙˆØ¯ Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ù¾Ú‘Ú¾Ù†Û’ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø§Ø±Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø³ÙˆÚ†Ø§ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¬Ú¾Ø±Ø¬Ú¾Ø±ÛŒ Ø³ÛŒ Ø¢Ø¦ÛŒÛ” Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø² Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ú©Ø§Ù†ÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú¯ÙˆÙ†Ø¬ Ø±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÛ” "Ø§Ø³ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ù…Ø³Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù† Ù…Ø³Ø¬Ø¯ Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø¬Ø§Ø±ÛÛ’ ÛÛŒÚºÛ” Ø¢Ù¾ Ú©ÛŒÙˆÚº Ù…Ø³Ø¬Ø¯ Ú©Ø§ Ø±Ø® Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ú©Ø±ØªÛ’ØŸ ÛŒÛ Ø±Ø­Ù…Ù† Ú©Ø§ Ø¨Ù„Ø§ÙˆÛ ÛÛ’Û” ÛŒÛ Ù…Ø§Ù„Ú© Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆØª Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø³Û’ Ø¯Ø¹ÙˆØª ÛÛ’"Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ø°ÛÙ† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø®ÛŒØ± Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø´Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ø´Ù…Ú©Ø´ ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒÛ” ÙØ·Ø±Øª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø² Ø¨Ù„Ù†Ø¯ ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒ: ØªÙ…ÛØ§Ø±Ø§ Ù†Ø§Ù… Ú©ØªÙ†Ø§ Ø®ÙˆØ¨ØµÙˆØ±Øª ÛÛ’â€¦..Ø¹Ø¨Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ûâ€¦..ØªÙ… Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ù†Ø¯Û’ ÛÙˆÛ” Ù…Ú¯Ø± Ù†ÛÛŒÚºâ€¦..ØªÙ… ØªÙˆ Ø´ÛŒØ·Ø§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ú†ÛŒÙ„Û’ Ø¨Ù†Û’ ÛÙˆØ¦Û’ ÛÙˆÛ” Ú©Ø¨Ú¾ÛŒ ØªÙ… Ù†Û’ Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø§Ù„Ú© Ú©Û’ Ø³Ø§Ù…Ù†Û’ Ø³Ø± Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø¬Ú¾Ú©Ø§ÛŒØ§Û” ØªÙ… Ú©Ø¨ ØªÚ© Ø²Ù†Ø¯Û Ø±ÛÙˆ Ú¯Û’ ØŒ Ú©Ø¨ ØªÚ© Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ø±ÛÛ’ Ú¯ÛŒØŒ Ú©Ø¨ ØªÚ© Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ù†ÛŒ Ø±ÛÛ’ Ú¯ÛŒØŸ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ø³Ø§Ù…Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ Ø¢Ú¯ÛŒØ§â€¦..Ø¶Ù…ÛŒØ± Ù†Û’ Ù…Ù„Ø§Ù…Øª Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹ Ú©ÛŒâ€¦..Ù…Ú¯Ø± ÙÙˆØ±Ø§Ù‹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ú©ÛŒ Ø±Ø¹Ù†Ø§Ø¦ÛŒØ§ÚºØŒ Ù¹ÛŒÙ„ÛŒ ÙˆÛŒÚ˜Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø³Ú©Ø±ÛŒÙ†ØŒ Ø§Ø³Ù¹ÛŒØ¬ØŒ Ø´ÛØ±ØªØŒ Ø¹Ø²Øªâ€¦..Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Øª Ù…Ø§Ù† Ù„ÙˆÚºØŸ ÛŒÛ Ú©Ø§Ù… Ú†Ú¾ÙˆÚ‘ Ø¯ÙˆÚºØŸ ÛŒÛ Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ù… Ø­Ø§ØµÙ„ Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø¨Û’ Ø­Ø¯ Ù…Ø­Ù†Øª Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¬Ø¯ÙˆØ¬ÛØ¯ Ú©ÛŒ ÛÛ’Û” ÛŒÛÛŒ Ø³ÙˆÚ†ØªÛ’ Ø³ÙˆÚ†ØªÛ’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø­Ø³Ø¨ Ø¹Ø§Ø¯Øª Ø³Ùˆ Ú¯ÛŒØ§"

"Ø´Ø§Ù… Ú©Û’ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ú©Ù¾Ú‘Û’ ØªØ¨Ø¯ÛŒÙ„ Ú©ÛŒÛ’Û” Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ø¬Ø§Ù†Û’ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ ØªÛŒØ§Ø±ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ. Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ú©Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø³Ø±Ú¯ÙˆØ´ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒØŒ Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢Ù†Ú©Ú¾ÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ù†Ø³Ùˆ ØªÚ¾Û’Û” ÙˆÛ Ú©ÛÛ Ø±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒ: Ø°Ø±Ø§ Ø¨ÛŒÙ¹Ú¾ Ø¬Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÚºâ€¦..Ø°Ø±Ø§ Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Øª ØªÙˆ Ø³Ù†ÛŒÚºâ€¦..Ú©ÛŒØ§ ÛÙ…Ø§Ø±Ø§ Ø±Ø§Ø²Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ù†ÛÛŒÚº ÛÛ’ØŸ Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ú©Ø§ Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ù„Ù‚Ù…Û Ø­Ø±Ø§Ù… Ú©Û’ ÛØ²Ø§Ø±ÙˆÚº Ù„Ù‚Ù…ÙˆÚº Ø³Û’ Ø¨ÛØªØ± ÛÛ’"

"Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ Ø§ÛŒØ³Ø§ Ù…Ø­Ø³ÙˆØ³ ÛÙˆ Ø§Ú©Û Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø²â€¦..Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒ Ú¯ÙØªÚ¯Ùˆâ€¦..Ø§Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ú©Ù„Ù…Ø§Øªâ€¦..ÛŒÙ‚ÛŒÙ†Ø§ Ø¯Ø±Ø³Øª ÛÛŒÚºÛ” Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº ØµØ¯Ø§Ù‚Øª ÛÛ’â€¦..ÛŒÛ ÙØ·Ø±Øª Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø² ÛÛŒÚºâ€¦..Ù…Ú¯Ø±â€¦..Ù…ÛŒØ±Ø§ ÙÙ†â€¦..Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø²â€¦..Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø´ÛØ±ØªØŸâ€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº ØªÛŒØ²ÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø¨Ú¾Ø§Ú¯Ø§ Ú©ÛÛŒÚº Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø§Øª Ù…Ø§Ù† Ù†Û Ù„ÙˆÚº"

"Ø±Ø§Ø³ØªÛ’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ú©Ù„Ù…Ø§Øª Ù…ÛŒØ±Ø§ Ù¾ÛŒÚ†Ú¾Ø§ Ú©Ø± Ø±ÛÛ’ ØªÚ¾Û’ Ú©Û Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ù¹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ú©Û’ Ø¯Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø²Û’ Ù¾Ø± Ù¾ÛÙ†Ú†Ø§Û” Ø§Ø³ Ø¯ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù† Ø¹Ø´Ø§Ø¡Ú©ÛŒ Ù†Ù…Ø§ Ø² Ú©Ø§ ÙˆÙ‚Øª ÛÙˆ Ú†Ú©Ø§ ØªÚ¾Ø§Û” Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ú©Ø§Ù†ÙˆÚº Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…ÙˆØ°Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø®ÙˆØ¨ØµÙˆØ±Øª Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¯Ù„ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§ØªØ± Ø¬Ø§Ù†Û’ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÛŒ Ø¢ÙˆØ§Ø² Ú¯ÙˆÙ†Ø¬ÛŒâ€¦..Ø­ÛŒ Ø¹Ù„ÛŒ Ø§Ù„ØµÙ„Ø§Ø©â€¦..Ø­ÛŒ Ø¹Ù„ÛŒ Ø§Ù„ÙÙ„Ø§Ø­â€¦.. "

"Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ù†ØµÛŒØ­Øª ÛŒØ§Ø¯ Ø¢Ø¦ÛŒâ€¦..Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ú©ÛŒ Ø±Ø­Ù…Øª Ø¬ÙˆØ´ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ú¯Ø¦ÛŒÛ” ÙØ³Ù‚ Ùˆ ÙØ¬ÙˆØ± Ø§ÙˆØ± Ú©ÙØ± Ú©Û’ ØºØ¨Ø§Ø± Ú©ÛŒ ØªÛ Ø¨ÛŒÙ¹Ú¾Ù†Û’ Ù„Ú¯ÛŒâ€¦..Ø§ÛŒÙ…Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±Øª Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ú©ÛŒ Ù‚ÙˆØª Ø²ÙˆØ± Ø¯Ú©Ú¾Ø§Ù†Û’ Ù„Ú¯ÛŒâ€¦..Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒØ±Ø§ Ø±Ø® Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ù¹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ø³Û’ Ù…Ø³Ø¬Ø¯ Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù ÛÙˆ Ú¯ÛŒØ§"

"Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø³Ø¬Ø¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„ ÛÙˆØ§ØŒ ÙˆØ¶Ùˆ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Û” Ø¬Ù…Ø§Ø¹Øª ÛÙˆ Ø±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒØŒ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø² Ø§Ø¯Ø§ Ú©ÛŒÛ” Ø¨Ø¹Ø¶ Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø²ÛŒÙˆÚº Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ Ù¾ÛÚ†Ø§Ù† Ù„ÛŒØ§Û” Ú©ÙˆØ¦ÛŒ ÛØ§ØªÚ¾ Ù…Ù„Ø§ Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’ØŒ Ú©ÙˆØ¦ÛŒ Ø¯ÙˆØ± Ø³Û’ Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù… Ú©Ø± Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’Û” Ø§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ú†ÛØ±ÙˆÚº Ù¾Ø± Ù…Ø³Ú©Ø±Ø§ÛÙ¹ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù…ÛŒØ±Ø§ Ú†ÛØ±Û Ø®ÙˆØ´ÛŒ Ø³Û’ Ø¯Ù…Ú© Ø±ÛØ§ ÛÛ’Û” Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ ÙØ·Ø±Øª Ú©Ùˆ Ù¾Ø§Ù„ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’"

"Ú©Ø³ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ ØµØ­ÛŒØ­ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ú©Ø§ Ù†Ø³Ø®Û ØªØ­ÙÛ’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯ÛŒØ§Û” ÛŒÛ Ø§Ø¨ Ù…ÛŒØ±Û’ Ù„ÛŒÛ’ Ù…ØªØ§Ø¹ Ø­ÛŒØ§Øª ØªÚ¾ÛŒâ€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ù¾Ù†ÛŒ Ù†Ø¦ÛŒ Ù…Ø§ÚˆÙ„ Ú©ÛŒ Ù‚ÛŒÙ…ØªÛŒ Ú¯Ø§Ú‘ÛŒ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø³ÙˆØ§Ø± ÛÙˆØ§Û” Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ø§ Ø±Ø® Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ù¹ Ú©Ù„Ø¨ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¨Ø¬Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø¯ÛŒÚ©Ú¾Ø§Û” Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ø¬Ùˆ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ ÙØ¬Ø± Ú©Û’ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ø¢ØªÛ’ Ø¯ÛŒÚ©Ú¾Ø§Ú©Ø±ØªÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒâ€¦..Ø¢Ø¬ Ø¹Ø´Ø§Ø¡Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯ÛŒÚ©Ú¾ Ø±ÛÛŒ ØªÚ¾ÛŒÛ” Ø¨ÛŒÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø¨Ú‘Ú¾Ø§Û” "Ø¨ÛŒÚ¯Ù…â€¦..ØªÙ…ÛÛŒÚº Ù…Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ú© ÛÙˆâ€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø¢Ø¬ Ø³Û’ Ú¯Ø§Ù†ÙˆÚº Ø³Û’ ØªÙˆØ¨Û Ú©Ø±Ù„ÛŒ ÛÛ” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ ÙØ³Ù‚ ÙˆÙØ¬ÙˆØ± Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù„ÛÙˆ Ùˆ Ù„Ø¹Ø¨ Ú©ÛŒ Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ú©Ùˆ ØªÛŒÙ† Ø·Ù„Ø§Ù‚ÛŒÚº Ø¯Û’ Ø¯ÛŒ ÛÛŒÚºÛ” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø³Ú†ÛŒ ØªÙˆØ¨Û Ú©Ø±Ù„ÛŒ ÛÛ’Û” Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û ØªØ§Ø¦Ø¨ ÛÙˆÚ¯ÛŒØ§ ÛÙˆÚºÛ”

"Ù¾Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ù…Ø­Ø³ÙˆØ³ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú¯ÙˆÛŒØ§ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ù†Ø¦ÛŒ Ø²Ù†Ø¯Ú¯ÛŒ Ú©Ø§ Ø¢ØºØ§Ø² Ú©ÛŒØ§ ÛÛ’ Ø³Ø¨ Ø³Û’ Ù¾ÛÙ„Ø§ Ú©Ø§Ù… ÙˆÛ Ø§Ø³Ù¹ÙˆÚˆÛŒÙˆØŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ú©Ø§ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…Ø§Ù„Ú© ØªÚ¾Ø§ØŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú¯Ø§Ù†Û’ Ø±ÛŒÚ©Ø§Ø±Úˆ Ú©Ø±Ø§ØªØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§ØŒ Ø¬Ø³ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¯Ù†ÛŒØ§ Ø¨Ú¾Ø± Ú©ÛŒ Ø¬Ø¯ÛŒØ¯ Ù…Ø´ÛŒÙ†ÛŒÚº ØªÚ¾ÛŒÚºØŒ Ø¬Ù† Ú©Ùˆ Ø¯Ù†ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û’ Ú©ÙˆÙ†Û’ Ú©ÙˆÙ†Û’ Ø³Û’ Ø¬Ù…Ø¹ Ú©Ø±ØªØ§ Ø±ÛØ§ ØªÚ¾Ø§â€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ø³Ù¹ÙˆÚˆÛŒÙˆ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¯Ø¹ÙˆØª Ø§Ù„ÛŒ Ø§Ù„Ù„Û Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ ÙˆÙ‚Ù Ú©Ø±Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û Ø§Ø¨ ÛŒÛØ§Úº Ù‚Ø±Ø¢Ù† Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ú©ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒØ³Ù¹ÛŒÚºØŒ Ø¹Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ú©Ø±Ø§Ù… Ú©ÛŒ ØªÙ‚Ø§Ø±ÛŒØ± Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³Ù„Ø§Ù…ÛŒ ØªØ±Ø§Ù†Û’ Ø±ÛŒÚ©Ø§Ø±Úˆ ÛÙˆÙ†Ú¯Û’ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù†Û’ Ù‚ÛŒÙ…ØªÛŒ Ú¯Ø§Ú‘ÛŒ ÙØ±ÙˆØ®Øª Ú©Ø±Ø¯ÛŒØŒ Ø®ÙˆØ¨ØµÙˆØ±Øª Ù…Ø­Ù„ Ù†Ù…Ø§ Ú©ÙˆÙ¹Ú¾ÛŒ ÙØ±ÙˆØ®Øª Ú©Ø±Ø¯ÛŒâ€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø§ÙˆØ³Ø· Ø¯Ø±Ø¬Û’ Ú©Û’ Ù…Ú©Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø¢Ú¯ÛŒØ§Û” Ø§Ø¨ Ù…ÛŒØ±Ø§ ÙˆÙ‚Øª Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ú¯Ú¾Ø± Ù…ÛŒÚº Ú¯Ø²Ø±Ù†Û’Ù„Ú¯Ø§Û” Ù…ÛŒØ±ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒÚ© ÛÛŒ ØªÙ…Ù†Ø§ØªÚ¾ÛŒâ€¦..Ø§ÛŒÚ© ÛÛŒ Ø¬Ø³ØªØ¬Ùˆâ€¦..Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø­Ù„Ù‚Û Ù‚Ø±Ø¢Ù† Ø³Û’ ÙˆØ§Ø¨Ø³ØªÛ ÛÙˆ Ú¯ÛŒØ§â€¦..Ø§Ø¨ Ù…Ø¬Ú¾Û’ Ù‚Ø±Ø¢Ù† Ù¾Ø§Ú© Ø­ÙØ¸ Ú©Ø±Ù†Û’ Ú©ÛŒ Ø®ÙˆØ§ÛØ´ ØªÚ¾ÛŒ"

11/5/16, 11:13 PM - Sheheryar Jamshaid: âš¡Thought of the Dayâš¡

ğŸ‘±ğŸ¼ğŸ’ğŸ¼ğŸ‘¸ğŸ™ğŸ»ğŸ™ğŸ¿
THE FOUR WIVES

There was a man with four wives. He loved his fourth wife the most and took great care of her and gave her the best.

He also loved his third wife and always wanted to show her off to his friends. However, he always had a fear that she might runaway with some other man.

He loved his second wife too. Whenever he faced some problems, he always turned to his second wife and she would always help him out.

He did not love his first wife though she loved him deeply, was very loyal to him and took great care of him. 

One day the man fell very ill and knew that he is going to die soon. He told himself, *_"I have four wives. I will take one of them along with me when I die to keep me company in my death."_*

Thus, he asked the fourth wife to die along with him and keep him company. *_"No way!"_* she replied and walked away without another word.

He asked his third wife. She said *_"Life is so good over here. I'm going to remarry when you die"._*

He then asked his second wife. She said *_"I'm Sorry. I can't help you this time around. At the most I can only accompany you till your grave."_*

By now his heart sank and he turned cold. Then a voice called out: *_"I'll go with you. I'll follow you no matter where you go."_*

The man looked up and there was his first wife. She was so skinny, almost like she suffered from malnutrition. Greatly grieved, the man said, *_"I should have taken much better care of you while I could have!"_*

Actually, we all have four wives in our lives.

a. *The fourth wife is our body.* No matter how much time and effort we lavish in making it look good, it'll leave us when we die.

b. *The third wife is our possession, status and wealth.* When we die, they go to others.

c. *The second wife is our family and friends.* No matter how close they had been there for us when we're alive, the furthest they can stay by us is up to the grave.

d. *The first wife is our soul,* neglected in our pursuit of material wealth and pleasure. It is actually the only thing that follows us wherever we go.

11/8/16, 3:29 AM - Amer Aslam: Aslamu alaiqum. 

Aaj ka notice hai sub ko. 

K is group ki sari batein ya discussions sirf 6 categories may aati hein. 

1. Lerkiyan videos ya pics. 
2. Paisa ya jobs ya economy. 
3. Comedy video ya pics. 
4. Mazheb. 
5. Siaset. 

Aur 6 "fazool talk". 
E.g " so rha tha, bus may tha, truck may. Gari may hoon. Chand dekha, soorej dekha , serk may khada hai. "

Waghera waghera. 

Yeh saray topics insaan k liye zaroori hein including fazool talk. Kayee dafa insani nefsiyaat ko yaqeen manein k fazool talk ki zarooret hoti hai. 

Ab yeh hai k kuch log kisi topic may interested hein to kuch kisi may. 

Ager sub log sub ka khayal krein to group bend ho jaye ga kiyonkay phir aap baat hi nhin kr sakein gay, k kisi ko kuch chahiye to kisi ko kuch. 

Jub do teen topics khulay hein aur baqi do teen bend. To samejh nhin aata. 

Kiyinkay jo topics khulay hein un may say mujhay bhi kayee batein nhin achi lagteen. 

May sirf skip kr dayta hoon. 

Sub ko pata hai k skip kaisay krtay hein. 

Humein itna ab mature ho kr baat krni aur suneni chahiye na k meri suno bus , bachpun ki tera aur may nay kisi ki nhin suneni. 

Ager again koi 42 + ho kr bhi itna abhi mature nhin to straight up ......chahay woh koi bhi ho , usay yeh group chor dayna chahiye. 

Aik chotay say ghar may behn bhaion may aik baat nhin hoti to yeh to baba itna bera mulk hai aur dunya us say bhi beri hai. 

Plz kuch mature honay ka saboot dein nhin to adaleti karwayee ka notice bhaija jaye ga. 

Akhir may freedom of speech pay uncle google per thori c research kr lein. 

Again jo cheez nhin pasand us ko sirf skip kr dein usay zati apni fazool ki ana ka masla na banayein kiyonkay is dunya may beray beray badshahon k sath jo hoa woh aap ko thori deir may aik documentary dikhatay hein sirf knowledge k liye, baqi hum sub ki koi awqat nhin. 

Shukrya.

11/9/16, 4:14 AM - Saif Azam: *Trump's first day at the Oval Office after being elected President.*

First briefing by the CIA, Pentagon, FBI:

Trump: We must destroy ISIS immediately. No delays.

CIA: We cannot do that, sir. We created them along with Turkey, Saudi, Qatar and others.

Trump: The Democrats created them.

CIA: We created ISIS, sir. You need them or else you would lose funding from the natural gas lobby.

Trump: Stop funding Pakistan. Let India deal with them.

CIA: We can't do that.

Trump: Why is that?

CIA: India will cut Balochistan out of Pak.

Trump: I don't care.

CIA: India will have peace in Kashmir. They will stop buying our weapons. They will become a superpower. We have to fund Pakistan to keep India busy in Kashmir.

Trump: But you have to destroy the Taliban.

CIA: Sir, we can't do that. We created the Taliban to keep Russia in check during the 80s. Now they are keeping Pakistan busy and away from their nukes.

Trump: We have to destroy terror sponsoring regimes in the Middle East. Let us start with the Saudis.

Pentagon: Sir, we can't do that. We created those regimes because we wanted their oil. We can't have democracy there, otherwise their people will get that oil - and we cannot let their people own it.

Trump: Then, let us invade Iran.

Pentagon: We cannot do that either, sir.

Trump: Why not?

CIA: We are talking to them, sir.

Trump: What? Why?

CIA: We want our Stealth Drones back. If we attack them, Russia will obliterate us as they did to our buddy ISIS in Syria. Besides we need Iran to keep Israel in check.

Trump: Then let us invade Iraq again.

CIA: Sir, our friends (ISIS) are already occupying 1/3rd of Iraq.

Trump: Why not the whole of Iraq?

CIA: We need the Shi'ite govt of Iraq to keep ISIS in check.

Trump: I am banning Muslims from entering US.

FBI: We can't do that.

Trump: Why not?

FBI: Then our own population will become fearless.

Trump: I am deporting all illegal immigrants to south of the border.

Border patrol: You can't do that, sir.

Trump: Why not?

Border patrol: If they're gone, who will build the wall?

Trump: I am banning H1B visas.

USCIS: You cannot do that.

Trump: Why?

Chief of Staff: If you do so, we'll have to outsource White House operations to Bangalore. Which is in India.

Trump (sweating profusely by now): What the hell should I do as President???

CIA: Enjoy the White House, sir! We will take care of the rest!

11/12/16, 7:22 AM - Shakil Ahmed: Assalaamualaikum all
11/12/16, 7:24 AM - Shakil Ahmed: my daughter's school sent an email after Trump to parents... I thought that was good... let me share it here
11/12/16, 7:28 AM - Shakil Ahmed: Assalamualiekum warehmatullahi wabaraktuh,
I hope this email reaches everyone in the best of health. This has been a very long and exhausting political year for all of us. Unfortunately, our children have been exposed to racism and hatred through social media, television, radio and the internet. Adults have been discussing the political campaign and which candidate is best for our community for almost a year now. Many of us and our children have been anxious and disappointed with the outcome of the election. We need to assure our children that Allah SWT has power over all things and is the best Protector. 
We spoke to the students on Tuesday after salah and on Wednesday after the morning halaqa about the election and how we should be strong and confident in Allah's protection and continue being the best examples of character and continue contributing positively to the community as much as possible.
Here are few suggestions for you as parents to help support your children:
1) Come to terms with your own feelings about the political climate. Renew your faith  in Allah (SWT) and your confidence that He is the Best Protector. Children will know how you feel in spite of what you say and when you are anxious, they will be also.
2) Constantly remind them that Allah is protecting us and that we should always remember to make dua for peace and safety for all people.
3) Please explain to them that people had many reasons for voting for Trump and that they don't necessarily agree with the negative comments he has made about Muslims and Islam.
4) Please remind themthat we should focus on being good and helping others as Islam teaches.
5) Please remind them to exhibit proper Islamic manners within the house and in public places.
6) Please remind them to be watchful of their surroundings also at the same time assure them that they are still well received in the community.
7) Please caution them to be careful with their words on text messages and social media.
8) Parents, please be careful what you say in front of your children. Alhumdulilah our children are very intelligent and observe us very closely.  
9) If you or your children experience any bullying, intimidation, threat or disrespect in the community please document the incident and report it to the police and CAIR.  Take pictures of the people involved it is safe to do so, and make a note of license plate numbers if possible. Discrimination and harassment is illegal and will only stop when people are held accountable for their behavior.
10) Please constantly remind your children that MUA teachers and adminstrators are here to help them, listen to them and they can openly discuss whatever is on their mind.
JazaakAllah khair,
Sr Saima


====================
Principal
Miftaahul Uloom Academy
Union City, NJ 07807

            Ú¯Ø²Ø´ØªÛ Ù…Ø§Û Ø³ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒÚ© Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø³Ø¦Ù„Û’ Ù¾Ø± Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ú©Û’ Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ø¨ ÙˆØ²ÛŒØ± Ø®Ø§Ø±Ø¬Û Ù†Û’ Ø¨Ø±ÛŒÙÙ†Ú¯ Ø¯ÛŒØªÛ’ ÛÙˆØ¦Û’ Ú©ÛØ§ Ú©Û 1998 Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ø³Û’ Ø¹Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ Ú©Ø§ Ø§ÛŒÚ© ÙˆÙØ¯ Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ø§ÛŒØ§ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ø§Ø³ ÙˆÙØ¯ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ù…ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÛŒ Ú©Û’ Ù¾Ø§Ø³ Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©Ø§ Ù†Ù‚Ø´Û ØªÚ¾Ø§ Ø§Ø³ Ù…ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ø¬ÛŒØ¨ Ø³Û’ Ù‚Ù„Ù… Ù†Ú©Ø§Ù„Ø§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ø³ÛŒ Ù†Ù‚Ø´Û’ Ù¾Ø± Ù„Ø§Ø¦Ù†ÛŒÚº Ù„Ú¯Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÚº  Ú©Û Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ ØªØ±Ù‚ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ø·Ø±Ù Ø§ÛŒÚ© Ø¨Ú‘Û’ Ø´Ø§ÛØ±Ø§Û Ú©ÛŒ Ø¶Ø±ÙˆØ±Øª ÛÛ’ ÙˆØ²ÛŒØ± Ø®Ø§Ø±Ø¬Û Ù†Û’ ÙˆÛ Ù†Ù‚Ø´Û Ù„ÛŒÚ©Ø± Ø§Ù¾Ù†Û’ Ù¾Ø§Ø³ Ù…Ø­ÙÙˆØ¸ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ú¾Ø± Ø§Ø³Û’ Ø¨ÛŒÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ù…ÛŒ Ø§Ù…ÙˆØ± Ú©Û’ Ù…Ø§ÛØ±ÛŒÙ† Ú©Û’ Ø³Ù¾Ø±Ø¯ Ú©ÛŒØ§ 10 Ø³Ø§Ù„ ØªÚ© Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„Ù Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù‚Ø¹ Ù¾Ø± Ø²ÛŒØ± Ø¨Ø­Ø« Ø±ÛØ§ ÛŒÛØ§Úº ØªÚ© Ú©Û Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ø§Ø³ ÙÛŒØµÙ„Û’ Ù¾Ø± Ù¾ÛÙ†Ú† Ú¯ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û Ù…ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ú©Ø§ØºØ°Ù¾Ø± Ù„Ú¯Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ ÛÙˆØ¦ÛŒ Ù„Ø§Ø¦Ù†ÛŒÚº Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ø§ÙˆØ± Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ú©ÛŒ ØªØ±Ù‚ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ Ù†Ø§Ú¯Ø²ÛŒØ± Ú¾Úº ØŒ Ù¾Ú¾Ø±Ø§Ø³ Ú©ÛŒÙ„Ø¦Û’ ÙÙ†Úˆ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø¯ÙˆØ³Ø±Û’ ØªÙ…Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù…ÙˆØ± Ú©Ø§ Ø¬Ø§Ø¦Ø²Û Ù„ÛŒØªÛ’ ÛÙˆØ¦Û’ 16 Ø³Ø§Ù„ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ø§ Ø¨Ø§Ù‚Ø§Ø¹Ø¯Û Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù† Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú†ÛŒÙ† Ù†Û’ Ø§Ø³ ÙˆØ¬Û Ø³Û’ Ø³ÛŒ Ù¾ÛŒÚ© Ú©Ø§ Ù¾ÙˆØ±Ø§ Ú©Ø±ÛŒÚˆÙ¹ Ø§Ø³ Ù…ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÛŒ ÛŒØ¹Ù†ÛŒ Ø­Ø¶Ø±Øª Ù…ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù†Ø§ ÙØ¶Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø­Ù…Ø§Ù† Ú©Û’ Ù†Ø§Ù… Ú©Ø±Ø¯ÛŒØ§ Ø§Ø³ ÙˆØ¬Û Ø³Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ø³Ú‘Ú© Ú©Û’ Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù† ØŒØ±Ø§Ø³ØªÛ’ Ú©Û’ ØªØ¹ÛŒÛŒÙ†ØŒØ¯ÙØ§ØªØ±ØŒ Ø±Ø§ÛÙ†Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ ØŒØ§ÙØªØªØ§Ø­ ØºØ±Ø¶ ÛØ± Ø§Ú¾Ù… Ø§ÛŒØ´Ùˆ Ù…ÛŒÚº Ù…ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù†Ø§ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¨Ø·ÙˆØ± Ù…ÛÙ…Ø§Ù† Ø®ØµÙˆØµÛŒ Ù…Ø¯Ø¹Ùˆ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§ØªØ§ Ú¾Û’ 
Ø§Ù„Ù„Û ØªØ¹Ø§Ù„ÛŒÙ° Ù…ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù†Ø§ Ú©Ùˆ Ø¬Ø²Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ø®ÛŒØ± Ø¹Ø·Ø§ ÙØ±Ù…Ø§Ø¦Û’ ØŒ  Ù¾Ø§Ú©Ø³ØªØ§Ù† Ù¾Ø± Ù…ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ù†Ø§ Ú©Û’ Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ø­Ø³Ø§Ù† Ú©Ùˆ Ù†ÛÛŒÚº Ø¨Ú¾Ù„Ø§ÛŒØ§ Ø¬Ø§Ø¦Û’ Ú¯Ø§Û”
11/18/16, 3:52 AM - Amer Aslam: Lkin nawaz shareef zindabad. 

Pakistan World Cup jeeta 
Nawaz shareer Zinda bad. 

Aitemee dhamakay 
Nawaz shareer zindabad. 

Yeh mehngai , yeh berozgari, yeh Bhook , yeh zillet, yeh load shedding. 
Imran khan murda bad. 


Jub pichlay 35 salon say siasat may ppp aur noora league. 

Aur in sub berbadion ka zimaydar Imran khan. 

Afreen us aqel aur nazer per jo chand do dikhaey lkin samnay serk per 4 foot khada nazer na aaye. 

Aisee Awam aur aisee beaqeli k liye shayed abhi koi lefz eejad hi nhin hoa.
11/18/16, 4:01 AM - Amer Aslam: https://youtu.be/RAQ5g7nLKMs
11/18/16, 4:05 AM - Amer Aslam: Is k baad bhi koi saboot mangay to phir to us benday ki aqel per hi shuk kiya ja sakta hai , us k ishq e nawaz shareer per nhin. 

Parliament may sub k samnay jhoot per yeh shakhs nawaz article 62 n 63 per sadiq aur ameen nhin rehta aur wazeer azam nhin reh sakta. 

Lkin ishq to janab ser cherh kr bolta hai. 

Spain U.K. Aur doosray mulkon per inhi videos aur interviews per prosecute kiya aur sub ko Jana pera. 

Lkin pakistan abhi aqel aur shaoor ki manzelein tay kr rha hai.
11/18/16, 4:11 AM - Amer Aslam: https://youtu.be/LETelf8PxqE

ïº©ï»­ï»§ï»®ï® Ù†Û’ ï»‹ïºªïºï»Ÿïº– ïºŸïºïº—ï®¯ Ú¾ï»®ïº‹ï®¯ ïº­ïº³ïº˜ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº©ï¯¾ï®‘ï®­ïº ï®ï®§ ïº©ï»­ ïºïº©ï»£ï¯½ ï»Ÿï® ïº­Ú¾ï®¯ ÛÛŒÚº ØŒ ïºï¯¾ï® ï»£ïº´ï» ï»¤ïºï»¥ Ú¾ï®¯ Ø¬Ø¨Ú©Û ïº©ï»­ïº³ïº®ïº ï¯¾ï®©ï»®ïº©ï¯¼ - ï­¼ï®­ï®ïºï»§ï®¯ ï®ï¯½ ï®ï»®ïº·ïº¶ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº©ï»­ï®ïºï»§ïºªïºïº­ ï®ï¯½ ïºï»§ï®•ï» ï¯½ ï¯¾ï®©ï»®ïº©ï¯¼ ï®ï¯½ Ø¢Ù†Ú©Ú¾ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ Ø¬Ø§ ï»Ÿï®•ï¯½ ïºï»­ïº­ ÛŒÛÙˆØ¯ÛŒ Ú©ÛŒ Ø¢Ù†Ú©Ú¾ ïº¿ïºïº‹ï»Š ï®¨ï»® ï®”ïºŒï¯½ - ï»Ÿï»®ï®”ï»®ï® ï»§ï®¯ ïº©ï»­ï®ïºï»§ïºªïºïº­ ï®ï»® ï­˜ï®‘ï® ï»Ÿï¯¿ïº ïºï»­ïº­ ï®ï®©ïº Ú©Û ï»‹ïºªïºï»Ÿïº– ï»Ÿï®¯ Ú©Ø± ïºŸïºïº‹ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ï®”ï®¯ - ïº©ï»­ï®ïºï»§ïºªïºïº­ ï­˜ïº® ïº©ï»­ Ù…Ù‚Ø¯Û’ ïº‘ï»¦ ï®”ïºŒï®¯ - 

ï»Ÿï»®ï®’ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï»“ïº®ï»­ïºµ ï®ï»® ï»Ÿï®¯ ï®ïº® ïºŸïº ï»‹ïºªïºï»Ÿïº– ï®ï®¯ ï»—ïº®ï¯¾ïº ï­˜ï®©ï»¨ï­» ï®”ïºŒï®¯ ïº—ï»® ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï»“ïº®ï»­ïºµ ïºÙ¾Ù†Û’ Ø¢Ù¾ Ú©Ùˆ Ú†Ú¾Ú‘Ø§ ï®ïº® ïº‘ï®­ïºï®”ï»¨ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ï®ïºï»£ï¯¿ïºïº ï®¨ï»® ï®”ï¯¿ïº ØŒ ï»£ï®•ïº® ï»Ÿï»®ï®”ï»®ï® ï®ï®¯ ï­˜ï¯¿ï­½ï®­ïº ï®ïº®ï»§ï®¯ ï­˜ïº® ï»—ïº®ï¯¾ïº’ï¯½ ï»£ïº´ïº ïºª ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº©ïºïº§ï» Ú¾Ùˆ Ú©Ø± ï»£ï¯¿ï»¨ïºïº­ ï­˜ïº® ï­¼Ú‘Ú¾ ï®”ï¯¿ïº - ï»Ÿï»®ï®’ Ø¬Ø¨ ïºïº± ï®ï»® ï­˜ï®‘ï®ï»§ï®¯ ï®ï®¯ Ù„Ø¦Û’ ï»£ï¯¿ï»¨ïºïº­ ï­˜ïº® ï­¼ï®ï®¬ï»¨ï®¯ ï»Ÿï®•ï®¯ ïº—ï»® ïºïº± ï»§ï®¯ ï­¼ï®­ï»¼ï»§ï®“ ï»Ÿï®•ïºïº‹ï¯½ ØªÙˆ ïºï¯¾ï® ïº‘ï»®ï®Œï®¬ï®¯ ïºïº©ï»£ï¯½ ï­˜ïº® ï®”ïº® ï®”ï¯¿ïº ïºŸïº² ïº³ï®¯ ï»­ï®¦ ïº‘ï»®ï®Œï®¬ïº ï»£ïº® ï®”ï¯¿ïº - 

ïºïº ïºïº± ïº‘ï»®ï®Œï®¬ï®¯ ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ï¯¿ï­©ï®¯ ï»§ï®¯ ïº‘ï®­ï¯½ ï»Ÿï»®ï®”ï»®ï® ï®ï®¯ ïº³ïºØªÚ¾ ï»£ï» ï®ïº® ïºïº± ï®ï»® ï­˜ï®‘ï® Ù„ÛŒØ§ ïºï»­ïº­ Ø³Ø¨ Ø§Ø³ Ú©Ùˆ ï»Ÿï®¯ ï®ïº® Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ï®ï®¯ ï­˜ïºØ³ ï­˜ï®©ï»¨ï­» ï®”ïºŒï®¯ - 

Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ Ù…Ø±ØºÛŒ ÙØ±ÙˆØ´ ï®ï»® ïº©ï¯¾Ú©Ú¾ ï®ïº® ï®¨ï»¨ïº² ï­˜ï®ïº ï®ï¯¿ï»®ï»§ï®‘ï®§ ïºïº³ï®¯ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï¯¾ïºïº© ïº ï®”ïºŒï¯½ ï»£ï®•ïº® ïº‘ïºï»—ï¯½ ïº©ï»­ ï®ï¯¿ïº´ï»®ï® ï®ïº ï»‹ï» ï»¢ Ø§Ø³Û’ ï»§ï®©ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº—ï®­ïº - 

ïºŸïº Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ï®ï»® ïº—ï¯¿ï»¨ï»®ï® ï®ï¯¿ïº´ï»®ï® ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ïºïº­ï®® ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº‘ïº˜ïºï¯¾ïº ï®”ï¯¿ïº ïº—ï»® Ø§Ø³ Ù†Û’ Ø³Ø± Ù¾Ú©Ú‘ Ù„ÛŒØ§ - Ø§Ø³ Ú©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ú†Ù†Ø¯ Ú©ØªØ§Ø¨ÙˆÚº Ú©Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ù¹Ø§ Ù¾Ù„Ù¹Ø§ Ø§ÙˆØ± Ú©ÛØ§ Ú©Û "Ú¾Ù… ØªÛŒÙ†ÙˆÚº Ù…Ù‚Ø¯Ù…Ø§Øª Ú©Ø§ ÛŒÚ©Û’ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø¯ÛŒÚ¯Ø±Û’ ÙÛŒØµÙ„Û Ø³Ù†Ø§ØªÛ’ Ú¾ÛŒÚº" ïº³ïº ïº³ï®¯ ï­˜ï®©ï» ï®¯ ï»‹ïºªïºï»Ÿïº– ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï®ï®¯ ï»£ïºï»Ÿï® ï®ï»® ïº‘ï»¼ï¯¾ïº ï®”ï¯¿ïº - 

Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ Ù†Û’ Ù¾ÙˆÚ†Ú¾Ø§ ïº—ï»¤ï®©ïºïº­ïº ïº©ï»­ï®ïºï»§ïºªïºïº­ ï­˜ïº® Ø¯Ø¹ÙˆÛŒ ï®ï¯¿ïº Ú¾Û’ ØŸ
ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï»­ïºï»»: ''Ø¬Ù†Ø§Ø¨ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø§ ïºïº± ï»§ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï¯¼ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï­¼ïº®ïºïº‹ï¯½ Ú¾Û’ ï®ï¯¿ï»®ï»§ï®‘ï®§ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ï»§ï®¯ ïº«ïº‘ïº¢ ï®ïº® ï®ï®¯ ïºïº± ï®ï»® ïº©ï¯¼ ïº—ï®­ï¯½ ï¯¾ï®§ ï®ï®©ïº˜ïº Ú¾ï®¯ ï®ï®§ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ïºï®Œ ï®”ïºŒï¯½ Ú¾Û’''  -  Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ØµØ§Ø­Ø¨ ! ï»£ïº®ïº©ï®¦ ï»£ïº®ï»ï¯½ ï®ï¯¿ïº´ï®¯ ïºï®Œ ïº³ï®‘ïº˜ï¯½ ï®¨ï®¯ØŸØŸ

Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ: '' ïº©ï»­ïº³ïº®ï®® ï»£ïºªï»‹ï¯½ ï®ï»® ï»»ïº… '' -  ï¯¾ï®©ï»®ïº©ï¯¼ ï®ï»® ï­˜ï¯¿ïº¶ ï®ï¯¿ïº ï®”ï¯¿ïº ïº—ï»® ïºïº± ï»§ï®¯ Ø¹Ø±Ø¶ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û '' Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ïº»ïºïº£ïº ïºïº± ï»§ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï¯¼ ïºï»§Ú©Ú¾ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïºï»§ï®•ï» ï¯½ ï»£ïºïº­ÛŒ Ú¾Û’ ïºŸïº² ïº³ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï¯¼ ïºÙ†Ú©Ú¾ ïº¿ïºïº‹ï»Š ï®¨ï»® ï®”ïºŒï¯½ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº‘ï®­ï¯½ ïºïº± ï®ï¯½ ïºï»§Ú©Ú¾ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïºï»§ï®•ï» ï¯½ ï»£ïºïº­ ï®ïº® ïºïº± ï®ï¯½ ïºï»§Ú©Ú¾ ïº¿ïºïº‹ï»Š ï®ïº®ï»§ïº ï­¼ïºï®¨ïº˜ïº ï®¨ï»®ï® '' 

Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ï»§ï®¯ ïº—ï®­ï»®ï®Œï¯¼ ïº©ï¯¾ïº® ïº³ï»®ï­º ï®ïº® ï®ï®©ïº: " ï»£ïº´ï» ï»¤ïºï»¥ ï­˜ïº® ï»ï¯¿ïº® ï»£ïº´ï» ï»¢ ï®ï¯½ ïº©ï¯¾ïº– ï»§ïº¼ï»’ ï®¨ï®¯ ØŒ ïºïº± ï»Ÿï¯¿ïºŒï®¯ ï­˜ï®©ï» ï®¯ ï¯¾ï®§ ï»£ïº´ï» ï»¤ïºï»¥ ïº—ï»¤ï®©ïºïº­ï¯¼ ïº©ï»­ïº³ïº®ï¯¼ Ø¢Ù†Ú©Ú¾ ïº‘ï®­ï¯½ ï­˜ï®­ï»®ï®Œï®® ï®”ïº ïºïº± ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ï»Œïºª ïº—ï»¢ ïºïº± ï®ï¯½ ïºï¯¾ï® Ø¢Ù†Ú©Ú¾ ï­˜ï®­ï»®ï®Œ ïº©ï¯¾ï»¨ïº " 
ï¯¾ï®©ï»®ïº©ï¯¼: " Ø¨Ø³ ïº­Ú¾Ù†Û’ ïº©ï¯¾ï®Ÿ ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïºï­˜ï»¨ïº ï®ï¯¿ïº² ï»­ïºï­˜ïº² ï»Ÿï¯¿ïº˜ïº ï®¨ÙˆÚº"

ï»£ïº®ï»§ï®¯ ï»­ïºï»Ÿï®¯ ïº‘ï»®ï®Œï®¬ï®¯ ï®ïº ïº‘ï¯¿ï­©ïº ïºï®”ï®¯ ïº‘ï®ï®¬ïº ïºï»­ïº­ Ø¹Ø±Ø¶ Ú©ÛŒØ§ Ú©Û " Ù‚Ø§Ø¶ÛŒ ØµØ§Ø­Ø¨ ïºïº± ï»§ï®¯ ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ïº‘ïºï­– ï­˜ïº® ï­¼ï®­ï»¼ï»§ï®“ ï»Ÿï®•ïºïº‹ï¯½ ïºŸïº² ïº³ï®¯ ï»­ï®¦ ï»£ïº®ï®”ï¯¿ïº "

ïºïº± ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ï»Œïºª ïº£ï»€ïº®ïº• ï»“ïºï»ƒï»¤Ûƒ ïºï»Ÿïº°ï®¨ïº®ïºïº€ ïº­ïº¿ï¯½ ïºï»Ÿï» Ù‘ï®§ ï»‹ï»¨ï®©ïº ï­˜ï®­ïº® ïº³ïº®ïº‘ïº´ïº ï»®ïº© ï®¨ï»® ï®”ïºŒï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïºï»­ïº­ ïºïº± ï»ƒïº®ïº¡ ïº©ï»‹ïº ï»£ïºï»§ï®•ï»¨ï®¯ ï»Ÿï®•ï¯¿ï®Ÿ :
'' ïºï®® ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ï»£ïºï»Ÿï® ! ïº£ï»€ïº®ïº• ï»‹ïºœï»¤ïºï»¥ ïº­ïº¿ï¯½ ïºï»Ÿï» Ù‘ï®§ ï»‹ï»¨ï®§Ù ï»§ï®¯ ïº—ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ï»£ïº¤ïº’ï»®ïº ï®ï®¯ ï®¨ïº® ï®¨ïº® ï»—ïºªï»¡ ï®ï®¯ ïº‘ïºªï»Ÿï®¯ ïºï¯¾ï® ï»ï»¼ï»¡ ïºïº¯ïºïº© ï»“ïº®ï»£ïºï¯¾ïº ï®¨ï®¯ ØŒ ï»“ïºï»ƒï»¤ï®§ ( ïº­ïº¿ï¯½ ïºï»Ÿï» Ù‘ï®§ ï»‹ï»¨ï®©ïº ) ï®ï®¯ ï­˜ïºïº± ïºïº—ï»¨ï¯½ ïºïº³ïº˜ï»„ïºï»‹ïº– ï»§ï®©ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ï®ï®§ ï»­ï®¦ ï»ï»¼ï»¡ ïºïº¯ïºïº© ï®ïº®ï®®Û”ïºï®® ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ïº­ïºÙ‘ ïº—Ùï»® ï»§ï®¯ ï­˜ï®©ï» ï®¯ ïº‘ï®­ï¯½ ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï¯¼ ï»»ïº ïº­ï®ï®­ï¯½ ïºï»­ïº­ ïºŸï»¨Ù‘ïº– ïº³ï®¯ ï®ï®­ïºï»§ïº ïº‘ï®­ï¯¿ïº ïº©ï¯¾ïºÛ”ïºïº ïº—ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ï»£ïº¤ïº’ï»®ïº ï·º ïºŸïº˜ï»¨ï®¯ ï»—ïºªï»¡ ï­¼ï» ï®ïº® ï»£ï¯¿ïº®ï®® ï®”ï®­ïº® ïºïº‹ï®¯ ïºïº—ï»¨ï®¯ ï®¨ï¯½ ïº³ïº®ï®ïºïº­Ù ïº©ï»­ ï»‹ïºï»Ÿï»¢ ï®ï®¯ ïºÙï»£Ù‘ïº˜ï¯½ ïºŸï®©ï»¨Ù‘ï»¢ ï®ï¯½ ïºï®’ ïº³ï®¯ ïºïº¯ïºïº© ï»“ïº®ï»£ïº ïº©ï®®Û” ''
ïºÙïº©ï®¬ïº® ïº³ï¯¿Ù‘ïºªï®¦ ï»“ïºï»ƒï»¤Ûƒ ïºï»Ÿïº°ï®¨ïº®ïºïº€ ïº­ïº¿ï¯½ ïºï»Ÿï» Ù‘ï®§ ï»‹ï»¨ï®©ïº ïºÙïº± ïº©ï»‹ïº ïº³ï®¯ ï»“ïºïº­ï» ï®¨ï»®ïº‹ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïºÙïº©ï®¬ïº® ïºŸïº’ïº®ïºïº‹ï¯¿ï» ïºï»£ï¯¿ï»¦ ï»‹ï» ï¯¿ï®§ ïºï»Ÿïº´Ù‘ï»¼ï»¡ ï»­ïº£ï¯½ ï»Ÿï®¯ ï®ïº® ïº‘ïºïº­ï®”ïºï®¦Ù ïº§ï¯¿ïº® ïºï»»ï»§ïºï»¡ ï·º ï»£ï¯¿ï®Ÿ ïº£ïºïº¿ïº® ï®¨ï»® ï®”ïºŒï®¯ ïºï»­ïº­ ïº‘ïº¸ïºïº­ïº• ïº³Ùï»¨ïºï»§ï®¯ ï»Ÿï®•ï®¯ :
